I went with the California, which was great, but I would skip the tomatoes. The salmon was really fresh and the toppings really finished it off. Made for a great lunch after a trip to the tunnels.

Had a shrimp and salmon bowl. Was absolutely lovely the fish was fresh and delicious. As were all of the ingredients. They give you lots of options to choose from and if you don't want to do that they have some recommendations on the board for you. Bit pricier compared to other places in Vietnam, but all the ingredients are high quality and fresh and you'd easy pay about $20 for this in Australia
Super cool place with great food. Unassuming building entrance, but the restaurant itself has a great atmosphere. Would’ve rated a five if they accepted credit cards.

Enjoyed a truly healthy meal. Just perfectly right and no guilt feeling. The staff are friendly and guided me how yo create my own bowl being a first - timer. They also gave me a 10% discount cos some ingredients have finished. I can for dinner late. The place is cool and cosy.; ; It is quite tricky to find it cos you have to walk the alley to bring you to second floor. BE MINDFUL of the BOOKSTORE which should serve as your landmark. You see the bookstore, Poke Saigon is on the 2nd F.; ; They ask for 300,000 VND deposit to use the elevator. YOU DONT HAVE TO. JUST USE THE STAIRS and when you land on the 2ndF its on your right.; ; Great healthy eating experience

Wonderfully fresh and tasty food delivered with a smile. The staff here guide you through your Poke choices with ease. It’s on the higher end of eating out in HCMC (150000 VND) but totally worth it. You need to enter an unassuming doorway and corridor and take the stairs up when you get here.

Het is even goed zoeken waar het is, maar dan heb je ook wat! Heerlijke en betaalbare poke bowls die je helemaal naar wens samen kan stellen. Personeel is heel vriendelijk, spreekt heel goed Engels en helpt je graag met samenstellen. Daarnaast ziet de zaak er heel leuk en stijlvol uit! Ook genoeg vega opties. Porties zijn groot genoeg.

We, 4 very close friends like sisters, had wonderful time there to enjoy the cosy atmosphere, fruity juice, eye-catching and yummy tasty food.; By the time, i wanna say thank to the very kindness of the owner. He offers us 4 bottles of fresh juice free as a kind of gift on my birthday. I still can feel of his warm kindness even i am writing to remind my last year birthday 2017 but the feeling is unchanged. Hope Poke SG and the Owner are more succesfull in the time to be.

First time for me. Went only cause I saw all the good reviews, but not sure I will be coming back so fast. Don't get me wrong, all was alright, but simply not my style. Definitely should be removed from cheap eat category, as it is definitely not cheap. Mid range, at least.
在網路上看到的美食，色、香、味俱全，顏色繽紛，口味十分，店員態度一百分，推薦好店，美味無負擔。讚喔！

Where we live a poke like that would cost 5 times what we paid here. It was fresh, super good, and a full bowl. The staff was awesome explaining everything, and the place is very cute, hidden.; I strongly recommend.

Was there this morning for breakfast and was thoroughly impressed with the meal. A little pricey if you're on a budget but great meal for 7-8 USD. Would highly recommend and will definitely be back myself

I saw Poke longtime ago but that time I have had dinner so I ignore it. But yesterday me and my bf have choose to visit there. Such a best choice ever, 1st time there so I felt a little strange to the way the make the salad, but after all I choose my own salad. I was so yummy, pineapple & guave juice are yummy too! Love this place. I will be back soon !
Even goed zoeken (het zit op de derde verdieping); Hele goeie bowls, rijkelijk gevuld en veel keus. Zeker een aanrader
Best place to go and get some healthy food also very cheap and nice staff that speak very good English

I absolutely love this place!! The poke bowls are delicious, with a wide variety of toppings, and super filling.; The staff is genuinely friendly and all round all stars.; Atmosphere is fantastic. I’d go back again and again! Highly recommend.

As with most travellers in the east after 2 months we were craving a fresh salad. Arrived here and it was unbelievable. All ingredients were chopped that morning and create a delicious salad with a surprising asian twist. Would highly recommend to anyone passing through Saigon.; ; Staff very friendly and the place itself clean and peaceful
Second time here. We came back for the fresh, healthy and delicious Poke bowls. They are served by helpful and smiling staff in a lovely clean restaurant. Highly recommended.

Love the poke bowl- fresh ingredients with great taste. Also friendly efficient service. We have gone back a couple of times for lunch. Totally worth it. Avoid 12-1 o clock as this is the lunch rush and you will have to wait and you may not get seating.

It's on the 2nd floor of the old apartment, go upstairs and look for the right side, do not have to use the elevator.; Totally it has 6 types of fish, also tofu for vegetarians and 6 types of sauces, I tried salmon and spicy tuna with shiso miso, both are awesome ; my husband chose spicy salmon and shrimp with extra octopus with wasabi mayo. He loves all. ; For the base, I was confused by the sushi rice, tapioca and salad so the staff accepted to make 3-in-1 for me. They're very nice and helpful, I really appreciated.  And as I expected, all the base are delicious, I like the tapioca the best, but my husband prefers the sushi rice.; All the toppings are good, some of the best I like are: mushrooms, fresh seaweed, eggplant and quail eggs. Try all and you will not disappointed.; Juices are fresh and tasty, we tried guava and watermelon.; Perfect staffs, perfect foods. Love all and absolutely will be back soon.

We nipped in here for a quick bite of lunch and will definitely be heading back tomorrow.; ; Pick your own poke bowl. Totally customizable. Have it your way.; ; All ingredients are great quality, fresh and above all else...tasty!; ; 150k for your bowl.; ; Enjoy!; ; Oh...and great interior design. You have to go down an alley and up a dark stairwell to get to it but don’t be put off. It’s well worth it!
Mình thích bên Lý Tự trọng hơn là Nguyễn Huệ.lâu rồi mới ghé lại thì cảm nhận thức ăn được chăm chút và trang trí đẹp hơn,sẽ ghé thường xuyên hơn vì gần nhà,nhân viên cũng ok nhưng hơi ít cười .
Tried Poke for the first time and it was great! It's a lovely little cafe and definitely worth a trip!

Mystery looking old Building houses this amazing Poke Station. Dont be Fooled by the entrance, keep walking those stairs upwards on take an elevator with 3000 dong. You will come across this small cafe style place with an amazing vibe inside. I was instantly greeted with super friendly smile that was so welcoming and refreshing. I was advised to wait for my table as the place was full but was approached 5 minutes later and was asked if i don't mind sitting with other people which I agreed. Small Counter with so many fresh ingredients to choose from to make your own bowl. I was helped by the girl on my selection and Voila there I had my super healthy amazing looking well arranged Bowl of Poke. First bite into it and it just tasted fresh, healthy and felt that has been prepared with love and care. Nothing soggy or stale instead everything looked very appetising and mouth watering. Loved my Bowl and I was quite full even with a Small Bowl.; Highly recommended place to Visit in Saigon.....

Tuna and Spicy tuna, try the Guacamole and fish roe (10K extra each) crab, mango, pineapple , beans, ginger and try a variety of different sauces. The warm raw egg isn't there anymore thank goodness, I was in the bathroom for 3 days after putting one of them on my Poke salad. Susi rice , brown rice and leaf salade bases or just mix. Not cheap but very enjoyable.
I really enjoyed my lunch here! All the ingredients were so fresh and there was lots to pick from. I would definitely go back during my stay.
Such a great poke bar. Unlimited toppings on your bowl. Don’t be put off when you drive it looks like an alley and you have to go up 2 flights of crappy stairs to find this hidden gem

Great little store in the heart of downtown HCM.; Healthy foods and great taste.; Tad difficult to find first time! Its in the multi level old looking building that has lots of food and coffee stores in it.; Highly recommend if wanting to find good healthy light foods.

Really like this place - excellent food. Very friendly and helpful staff who made great recommendations on how to build the salad bowl as I was not familiar with the process. The entrance through a line of parked motorbikes is strange but the cleanliness and atmosphere of the restaurant is excellent. Really recommend this for something different to try.
The staff is wonderful and kind, and the food is out of this world delicious!!! This was exactly what I needed after a long travel day. I would definitely come again!
This is my favourite restaurant in Ho Chi Minh City! All the ingredients are fresh and tasty. Furthermore, the staff is super nice and friendly and always serves you with a smile.

If you’re looking for fresh food with wonderful staff, come here. The food was delicious, fresh, adorable and quick. The two young ladies working were friendly, personable and eager to help us. Thanks so much!!! Will definitely be back!
It is one of the best choices for healthy lunch. I picked many topping from my choice. Quite heathy ... a little bit high price but I think its worth for the fresh food
First time I had poke. It’s very tasty. Will be a fan of poke after this. The portion is generous. A friendly and kind staffs. A restaurant with very nice ambience and clean.
This place is delicious. It’s in a funky building but don’t let that deter you. The food is fresh and tasty, the service is very good and the staff speaks English quite well
Nicest place to have a poke bowl in Saigon! Highly recommended! Very nice location and helpful staff!

Perfect restaurant if you want to eat something different and more healthy than the Vietnamese food. These poké bowls don’t only even look amazing, they taste even better. They are made fresh in 1 minute time and the staff speaks perfectly English. In the two weeks we were in Saigon, we went here 3 times.

Es un sitio de ensaladas hawaianas, dónde te la vas montando tú por pasos. Las ensaladas estaban muy buenas, las pedimos con base de ensalada y arroz de sushi y luego les vas añadiendo ingredientes (atún o salmón crudo, gambas...), la salsa y toppings (piña, mango, surimi, tomatitos cherry...); En comparación con los precios que habíamos visto de comida vietnamita un poco caro 150.000 VND el cuenco de ensalada pero estaba todo muy rico.

With experience of 25 years of excellent Vietnamese dishes, I could state here that this move to eat totally fresh food was quite a step. It was worth to try! Our group of four enjoyed the food the ambience of the little restaurant with good service for the first timers. This won't be the last time, felt so good after this lunch!

This food is incredibly fresh and tasty, and made a refreshing change from Vietnamese food. You choose which base, sauce and toppings you want to make it just how you like. I loved the spicy tuna and the crab salad especially. The portion is generous, surprisingly very very filling. Also, the place itself is lovely and cosy and the staff are so sweet! I wish I lived in Saigon so I could go everyday!!
Ga hier heen! Heerlijke mega beker vol good stuff. Chille aloha vibe en tof personeel. Verstopt op de 1e verdieping na het doorsteken van een soort woonkamer van iemand. Maakt het extra leuk :p

Ingredients were fresh, and the flavours were amazing. The dishes are reasonably priced and the staff are very friendly. As someone that doesnt eat poke very often, it was good to try out recommendations from the staff. Great ambience too!; This place is a must visit when travelling through Ho Chi Minh, and i'll definitely drop by once again, before i leave :); ; Do take note that the outlet is not at street level so you may walk past the location, the entrance is actually at the 2nd storey of a shophouse. Keep an eye out for the sign! :)

Trevlig och fräsch liten restaurang. Mycket trevlig personal och god mat, mycke att välja mellan till alla poke bowls. Var dock lite svårt att hitta. En trappa upp i en med en lite blygsam skylt ute på gatan. Men helt klart värt att gå hit!!!

Très difficile à trouver depuis la rue, ce restaurant est une excellente surprise! Les plats (spécialités hawaïennes) proposés sont absolument délicieux et les produits utilisés sont très frais, goûtus et parfumés. Le personnel est très gentil et le cadre du restaurant est original et bien pensé.; Je recommande.
Heerlijk gegeten bij Poke Saigon. Super vriendelijke meiden, goed advies, verse producten, heerlijke poke bowls. Jammer dat we zo kort in Saigon zijn, anders zouden we zeker terug komen.

We hadden de goede beoordeling gevonden van de zaak op TripAdvisor en besloten om hier te komen lunchen. We hebben zeer lekker gegeten. Het is een leuk concept en ze maken gebruik van lekkere en verse ingrediënten. Zeker een aanrader om smiddags te komen eten!
Super lekker en gezond. Het is even zoeken, want het zit op de derde verdieping. Wij zijn door twee super lieve meiden geholpen. Echt top!
Unreal. In a tucked away little spot so can be difficult to find but well worth it. The girls working there were so helpful and the food was amazing.

This one deserves its rating cause it’s so good! Even though it’s a salad bar it has truly a lot of good choices. It’s also very hidden so you have to go up some stairs that doesn’t look like it’s going to this magical place but when you’re there you’ll know. It’s not too big though so wouldn’t bring the whole family but a group of 5 - 10 is probably okay if it’s not busy. Would recommend!
Found on TripAdvisor and was not disappointed at all! Every ingredient was super fresh and tasted perfect! Nice ladies behind the counter who spoke perfect English! Would definitely recommend!

I was looking for something vegetarian and healthy food at the same time, not the usual tipe of food you can find all around Vietnam, and I found this gem.; It is located on the second floor of an apartment building along with many other restaurants. You can choose one tipe of fish or tofu (2 scoops, pay more if you want more scoops) and a base, and you can add so colorful toppings for free. I chase the salmon (was delicious) and the brown rice base (delicious too) with many vegetables and toppings to make it the more colorful I could.; The staff is so friendly and smily, I definitely will recommend you to try it at least once, but also twice or more times!
Fantastic flavours and an impressive variety of poke toppings. Friendly staff and cosy atmosphere. Fresh and delicious
Super essen! Gute bowl zu angebrachten Preisen, gute Abwechslung zum sonstigen Essensangebot. Würde definitiv wieder kommen

Dropped by with my wife and two young kids. We all tried something different and the kids had fun customising their meals...the coconut juice was a nice touch. Extremely tasty food, warm ambience and attentive staff.; Highly recommend!
A bit overpriced because when considering HOW cheap you can eat on the street But great service and delicious food! Look for a tall house with a lot of adcertisments on It ;)
The best poke bowl ever! Just go and enjoy!! You can pick whatever you like! Complete it with a cold drink. Not cheap but worth every dollar or dong.

Just found you and you’re awesome!!! Absolutely nice staff here, nice place, WiFi, everything you need! Did I say the food is amazing? So tasty and a good price! This is the best food so far! Perfect also for vegetarian as I am!!! A bit hidden though!! Leftside of the shoppingmall, dark entrence at the very back right side, go upstairs! Cool shops to discover in this staircase

Loved this place! Fresh, tasty and healthy bowls for a good price. Instagram friendly for sure! Smart concept on this restaurant. Hidden in a pretty strange place we were surprised how nice and fresh the place was! Recommend this to everyone!

I had a tuna bowl with rice. It was great! There are many toppings to choose from and the staff are really helpful. The venue is very small, so you may have to wait a few minutes for a seat. But its worth it!; ; The only real downer with this place is the elevator. Please dont use it! You have to pay to get upstairs just one floor. So just use the stairs. This is not the fault of the restaurant, but the house owner. There are many other small restaurants in the same house and the house owner has made a business of the elevator....

Do your stomach(and pocket) a big favour and go in for fresh food filled with variety and put together from the heart without breaking the bank. The staff are also amazing and help newbies the entire way through. Look forward to many more.

At least this restaurant is special - the entrance ressembles more a garage than a restaurant. On the second floor then, besides some small fashion shops you will find this small spot. The food is Poke - a bowl that may be combined by your own choice. But the portions are small and the choice is limited. And not so tasty as some describe - if you are not a brown rice healthy food style lover. Not suited for a full meal - at least not for someone with a healthy appetite.

I never had Poke until I came to Saigon, and I was missing out! The food here is fresh, healthy, and nutritious. I usually get a bit of everything. I love that it's located on Nguyen Hue in a modern, clean setting. It's nice to pop in for lunch on the weekend or grab dinner. Staff are very friendly and helpful!
There were so many colors with the bowl.  Various taste and textures at once that match amazingly. I wish we had this at my home.  I would eat here so often. 5 bubbbbblessss with love
건강한 식사를 하고 싶다면 가면 아주 좋네요 영어로 설명도 잘해주고 음식도 맛있었네요. 단지 아쉬운건 가격이 저렴하다 해서 갔는데 생각보다 싼편은 아니였네요. 그래도 너무 만족했습니다.
me gustó mucho la comida!! el arroz está bien cocido y no viscoso, el topping es tan bueno y vảiable. Me gustan más los huevos de codorniz. Gracias por la gran comida!!!

Best een uitdaging om dit leuke restaurantje te vinden, maar zeker de moeite waard.; Zie foto’s waar je naar binnen moet lopen, dan is het de 2e verdieping.; Ziet er van binnen heel netjes uit en je wordt ook goed geadviseerd.; Eten is super

Dopo quasi un mese di zuppette, trovare il poke è stata una gioia! E qui al Poke Saigon è davvero buonissimo. Il locale è anche molto carino, per trovarlo bisogna entrare e salire all’interno di un palazzo (lo si nota perché è un palazzo ricoperto di loghi luminosi). Consigliatissimo!
Nous y avons été par pur hasard mais nous n’avons pas du tout été déçu. Le saumon été bien assaisonné et fondait en bouche. Je recommande vivement

Na de goede recensies de Poke bowl geprobeerd. Wat heerlijk. In een paar stappen wordt je bowl dmv het kiezen van allerlei ingrediënten klaargemaakt (zie foto). Het smaakte erg lekker.; De mensen die er werken waren ook erg vriendelijk.; Een aanrader.; Het is in een gebouw met restaurants. Als je op de juiste verdieping bent, is het de 1e tent aan je rechterhand (als je met de trap gaat). De lift kost 3000 VND

We were walking around the street in Saigon, and it was time for lunch, I look on my phone to see what was around us, Poke Saigon pop up, it was about 100 metres away, you need to look for it, the entrance is a parking for motorcycle, walk through, take the stairs to the first floor turn left the Restaurant entrance is about 20 meters on the right. Once inside on the right side there is a refrigerate service counter with foods display, next to is the black board menu. First you choose the rice, and a selection of toppings and all the ingredients are mixed together in front of you and placed on top of the rice in the bowl. The food was great and very fresh.; Just a small lay down they don’t take plastic cards...

Klein, maar fijn restaurantje verstopt in HCMC. Het interieur is modern gezellig. Het personeel is heel aardig en behulpzaam. Het eten is goed. Nog nooit een poké bowl op, maar smaakt naar meer! Echt een aanrader als je in HCMC bent!

Se estão a visitar o Vietname há já vários dias, por vezes, experimentar outro tipo de cozinha pode ser uma ótima ideia para não enjoar a cozinha local. Seguimos a avaliação do Tripadvisor e gostamos muito do PokeSaigon. Optamos pela sugestão do poke californiano e um personalizado e ficamos muito satisfeitos com a quantidade e qualidade da comida. O acesso ao restaurante pode parecer duvidoso mas o espaço é limpo e cuidado! Vale a pena visitar !!!

Es gibt Bowls mit braunem Ries bzw. Sushireis und/oder Salat, verschiedenen Fischsorten und eine vegetarische Variante mit Tofu. Eine Portion kostet 150.000 Dong. Ich finde den Preis etwas hoch für die eher kleine Portion, das Essen war aber wirklich lecker.; Um in den Laden zu kommen muss man durch das Tor mit der Hausnummer 42 und dann die Treppe ins 2. OG hochgehen.

Loved our poke bowls at Poke Saigon! It’s worth the visit! It’s in an alley way on the second floor! Go up the stairs because the elevator will cost you dongs! Very cute space and friendly customer service and they speak English! I highly recommend it!

Hidden gem! Once you go down the lane and up the winding stairs, you'll find Poke Saigon. The staff are friendly, the space is beautiful and most importantly the food is amazing. It is western prices but they give a great portion (and Im a big eater) so I do feel its worth the money.

Nog nooit eerder een poke Bowl gehad. Maar ben gelijk over! Wat lekker zeg!; Ik kan alleen slecht keuzes maken dus zat er erg veel in de bowl. Maar dit maakte het nog lekkerder om te eten!; ; Voor weinig geld heel veel lekkers!; ; Zat in mijn bowl:; ; - rijst; - Sla; - Sesamzaad dressing; - Spicy tonijn; - Spicy zalm; - Mayo chilli dressing; - Champignon erg fijn gesneden en gebakken; - Mango; - Ananas; - Zeewier; - Radijs; - Rode gember; - Gedroogd zeewier; - Gebakken knoflook; - Komkommer; - Tomaat; - Mais

Sano, refrescante y delicioso. Estupendo local con pokes superfrescos y ricos. Pedí el hawaiano que incluye arroz tostado, atún y wakame y ha sido una delicia. Ojalá se ponga de moda esta comida en España y a precios asequibles como aquí. Dos poke bowls, comidos y por 14 euros con la bebida.
Como amantes y clientes asiduos de los pokés nos adentramos en este restaurante, en el que probamos probablemente el mejor poké de nuestra vida. Simplemente increíble
Hele lekkere poke bowls zelf samen te stellen met heerlijk verse ingredienten. Spicy en niet spicy, voor sommige topping is het 10k extra.; ; Enjoy!

I liked their style. This was new to me and the ladies behind the counter were awesome. Super welcoming the moment we walked in and very clearly explained every step of the ordering process. Loved it!

Delicious fresh ingredients that made for a great lunch. Relatively cheap and the bowls are decently sized (we had one between 2 people). The staff spoke great English and clearly explained how to order and what everything was with a smile on their face. Would recommend.

At the end of 2 weeks in Vietnam we were craving fresh ingredients and salads-a bit more like home. Much as we have loved Vietnamese food, we were looking for something different. This place is amazing. It was completely delicious food in a very cozy and pretty cafe style environment. It really was exactly what we wanted tonight! Thank you
We absolutely loved Poke Saigon, well decorated, clean,fresh, and most importantly the best Poke ever. The staff at Poke are so helpful and willing to please. I will definitely be back
Poke Saigon is in the cafeapartment at walking street. Was a bit tricky to find but the food was very fresh. Cosy inside aswell. Took sushi rise as base.
Trés bien pour 150k soit environ 8USD vous avez un poke .; ; Les produits sont frais, le staff est très souriant - Rien à redire - parfait pour un déjeuner healthy & rapide
Delicous fresh food served by lovely people At a Cosy, funny place. I was new to the poke concept but after this afternoon I am a hardcore fan

We came here because of the reviews and because we were in search of some healthy fresh food to make a change from the usual street food in Vietnam (which is also lovely) it didn't disappoint, friendly staff, gorgeous food! You make your own bowl and it caters for veggies/vegans. A must visit whilst in Saigon! A little hard to find, on the 3rd floor of a hidden small shopping complex but worth the effort!!

A cute little restaurant hidden on the second floor, but easy to find if you have the address and follow the signs. Delicious poké bowls, big portions and you can as many topings as you'd like. Friendly staff, definitely recommend to go there!

A bit tough to find as it doesn’t seem to have any street signage, but well worth the effort! If you find the big bookshop, look just to the left of it and go down the dark, seedy looking corridor and up the stairs and you’ll find it.; Poke was great - I would happily eat there every day! Staff were friendly and spoke good English. Limited seating opportunities. 150k for the standard bowl

The pokebowls are so goodd. I like the fact that "you can have as many toppings as you like". And like that you can also choose brown rice. You have a lot of options for the toppings and everything is nice and fresh, yammmm. We loved it.
Tasty healthy food, a MUST try in Saigon!; Little gem hidden at the second floor of the Cafe Appartment. Fresh prepared and variety of dishes for veggie as well. Love their sushi rice and salad.

It’s weird that he pokey place would be the top rated restaurant in Saigon, but we just ate here and it was phenomenal. The portions are very generous, the meat is delicious and fresh, and you get unlimited toppings on your bowl. The service was excellent as well - they were out of one type of meat so the owner apologize profusely and gave me a double portion of something else for free. My wife is vegetarian and they made her a very tasty and filling vegetarian bowl that she loved, especially since it’s kind of hard to get a vegetarian food in this country sometimes. We will be back before we leave!
I feel like a happy baby in a Candy shop! Love it! You can chose your own filling, the people are really friendly and it has a nice atmosphere.
Yummy fresh healthy food at reasonable price. Space is a little small but ideal for a quick bite before getting back to explore the streets of Saigon again.

Just go and eat there. Veggie friendly if you like tofu.; ; Basically you pick whether you want a sushi rice base or a brown rice base or a mix of rice and salad for a slightly lighter meal (I recommend this). Then you pick a fish or tofu and a sauce to go with it. Then you can pick from a load of different delicious salad items, which all weirdly seem to work together.

I don't take photos of the food as I just almost finished till something happened. I did enjoy the food, taste was good, I like spicy salmon and spicy tuna with many options of topping BUT I suddenly stop what I eat as I found long hair on my poke bowl food.; ; Pls cover the hair of your people who serve the food, it is terrible when you enjoy the food and found a long hair on your food... :(

Delicious Poke in a really cool building- hard to find at first but once you find it, its totally worth it. Fresh ingredients and wonderfully sweet staff.; We also had fun afterwards checking out all the other cute cafes and shops in this old building.

Best Poke in Ho Chi Minh! The ingredients are so fresh and the staff is so sweet. It is a bit difficult to find and the building is quite unpleasant you wouldn’t expect to find this in there! Definitely a must go to if you’re in Ho Chi Minh!

We found the place a bit by chance and we decided to have lunch there... it was sooo good! The best food in Ho Chi Minh so far. We are even thinking in going back for dinner tonight  we also tried one of the fresh juices, which was very good as well. Super nice staff!
Blink and you’ll miss .... so hard to find in a real backwater of an alley but once you eventually locate it,you’ll be in for a nice surprise. Great food great prices, fast and friendly service .

The best meal I’ve had in my two-week trek through Vietnam. Would recommend to anyone. The spicy tuna and spicy salmon in particular were amazing. Pleasant, quiet ambience perfect for a date or nighttime respite from the craziness outside.
Lovely place in the middle of HCMC. The Owners are so passionated about what they do and they do it great. If you are looking for a healthy meal, this is the place to go.
Food delivery order right at the door of my hotel.; ; Good enough if you want something fresh and healthy.
Really nice place with great poke! Hard to find it (pretty ugly entrance, then go upstairs) but definitely try it!

This place is a must go in Ho Chi Minh City. The interior is very compfy and clean. You get a choice of either brown rice or japanese rice or salad or mixed of two of these. There are great choices of ingredients. Many tastes and textures you get. The choices are raw salmon and tuna. Optionally spiced as well. I loved the cucamole and the sauerkraut also. It made it all special. The staff are friendly and speak well English. The prices are really cheap. I pay much more for this high quality back home. I give the 5th bubble cause they gave me no trouble :-)); ; I highly recommend to come here if you are visiting hcmc.
Het is even lastig te vinden, het is op de 2e etage, je hoeft dus met de lift. Lief schattig restaurantje waar je heerlijk poke bowl kunt eten. Echt een verrassing!
The food was delicious and the service was spot on. The owner was great at making recommendations for her dishes and gave further suggestions for our trip.
Absolute banger. Stumbled upon this place by accident. Bit of a tricky spot to find but well worth the hunt.

We love this restaurant, we went there 4 times in 5 days. The food is so fresh. I am a nervous eater overseas but my 12 year old son ate raw fish every time and did not feel sick once. The staff are very friendly and help you create a bowl of the tastiest foood we had in Vietnam.
Great place to eat, very tasty and fresh food. The service is very good and welcoming.; Prices are fair.; Highly recommend.

This restaurant was hard to find unless you dare to speak local people around you. Although the entrance was quit scary the restaurant it self was lovely and very well decorated. Service was friendly and fast. We had to wait our turn but it was forth it! Spicy salmon had so much good flavours in it. Ingredients were fresh and clean. Size of the meal/bowl was just right.

The cozy small restaurant hidden in an old apartment, it's a bit hard to find but totally worth the try.; The food was amazingly fresh and delicious  these staffs were really sweet and helpful, if you had no idea what to choose just followed their recommendations.; Try the guava juice, it was epically tasty juice only can find in tropical countries.
Really lovely crisp and fresh ingredients, good value and a cool place! Would definitely like to visit again.

Es uno de los más recomendados de Saigón y la verdad que tiene mucho encanto. Empezando por el edificio lleno que tienes que subir por unas escaleras muy tétricas , todo el edificio es tétrico pero muy interesante. Mezcla de estilos y de diversidad. El restaurante es para escoger lo que se quiere mediante combinaciones de distintos tipos de comida. Te dan unos 6 ingredientes a escoger, verduras , frutas , arroces , lechugas, frutos secos y distintas salsas , todo a tu gusto.; Muy divertido y muy saludable. El lugar es agradable y el ambiente es muy de turista.

Stopped here for lunch after seeing a number of reviews on trip advisor.; ; We had no idea what to expect (the direction on other reviews are spot) but simply it’s left if the book shop down the alley way and then take the stairs until you see the sign (first or second floor); ; We had never had a “Poke” but the staff were great and talked through the process and steps etc. I took the easy option and had the Californian (recommended on the board) but my partner created her own from scratch and wasn’t disappointed; ; It’s a great clean and bright little place and the staff couldn’t do more to help.; ; The food, flavours and smells are fantastic and well worth a visit regardless of your budget.
入り口が少し判りづらく、恐る恐る1Fに登ると左奥にありました!小綺麗な少し女性向けなお店です。初めてと言うと親切に教えてくれます。マグロ、エビ、野菜色々。ボールに寿司メシをたっぷりの上に載せます!美味しいです。でも少し食べづらい正直!?値段は150,000VND。こんなもんかな?ちょっと高いかな！もう一回行ってみます!
Awesome combo of fresh Hawaiian food! Why don’t we have this in Australia!? Very friendly and helpful staff who are fluent in English.
Super verse pokebowl. Echt een aanrader.; Lus je iets niet geen probleem, je mag alles zelf samen stellen.

Eine coole Location und super leckere Poke Bowl. Man kann sich alles nach seinem eigenen Geschmack zusammenstellen und dann drauf los löffeln.; Der Laden befindet sich im 2. Stock des Cafe Apartments an der Fußgängerzone. Definitiv eine Abwechslung vom vietnamesischen Essen.
Cute little place hidden inside an eclectic property. The food was delicious and the service was phenomenal, Vietnamese girl took care of us and was really extremely nice. Would definitely recommend!

Super freundliche Bedienung, alles sehr frisch und schmeckt sehr gut! Schöne Location. Ist zu empfehlen! Der Eingang ist etwas versteckt. Einfach in das „unscheinbare“ Gebäude rein und ein paar Stufen nah oben.
We had two bowls and enjoyed them very much, the concept is nice, the food super fresh and tasty, and prices are friendly.; Great place to have non Vietnamese dinner if you need it
The poké is so good here. Two friendly ladies, which are happy to help explaining the concept. There is so much choice and the portion is big! Hard to find but worth visiting.
Me and my friend ate pitaya smoothie bowls which tasted delicious ! Also the staff were very friendly.
Fresh ingredients, tasty bowls and friendly staff! A great surprise out of the classic schemes of Vietnamese food!
Base: sush rice, poke: salomon, sauce: soy sauce, toppings: nearly every one, crisp: ginger.; ; Taste: So delicious!; ; Price: 180k /w water; ; Result: Any time again. ANY TIME! Thank you!

We had lunch here, we both got different poke bowls and both of them were amazing!; The products are so fresh and delicious.; The decor of the place is stunning and the staff were just so nice and helpful.; Definitely recommend this place!
Such a nice place to grab lunch or dinner. They are very friendly and everything is clean. You food is delicious!!!; Totally recommend this place.; ; Btw it’s in the second floor
Leuke locatie. Heerlijke pokebowls met verse ingrediënten. Er is genoeg om uit te kiezen. Personeel is heel vriendelijk.

The food is absolutely incredible as are the staff!! Had such a pleasant experience today.. All three girls working were incredibly helpful in communicating the food process as well as giving us their favorite combinations !! Deliciously fresh food with a wide variety of options! One portion was enough to feed myself and save some for later.. An amazingly positive experience, will undoubtedly visit again!!
Here in Vietnam I found the best poke that I ever ate in my life. You can make you own poke with your favorite ingredients! Amazing!

Such a lovely little place, probably wouldn’t see it from the outside as it is hidden inside a 9 stories high building. From the outside you can see the different shops and restaurants that are hidden inside this building on one of the biggest streets of Saigon.; ; The poke bowls are absolutely lovely and the service is outstanding. The two girls working there were so kind and literally filled up the poke bowl with everything they had as we couldn’t decide.; ; Would definitely recommend to anybody!
Ordered online Poke bowl + fresh juice combo. It was amazing. The best healthy and fresh food I ever had in Ho Chi Minh City.

Beside 1 or 2 options that you have to pay an extra of money (which is 10k per scoop), you can pay for combo and get anything you like on the table display. I love the fresh ingredients. Definitely try more of this Hawaiian cuisine!

If not, the best thing I've eaten period.; The staff are super helpful and tailor the perfect pokebowl for you. There is immense choice and it is just to die for.; Mindblowingly good.; ; DONT EVEN HESITATE. GO!
First time we tasted poke, only fresh ingredients with raw fish over rice. It's colourful, it's tasty, I'd definitely come back.

We tried poke for the first time! All ingredients were fresh and really really good! I specially fell in love with spicy tuna, mango and wasabi mayo <3 We also try fresh watermelon and guava juices which were really good too! Totally recommend this place! :)
This was some of the best poke I've ever had. Highly recommend going if you are in Ho Chi Minh City. The people are very nice as well.

We went to this restaurant randomly, and were pleasantly surprised.; The food was delicious and we liked the fact that we can compose our own poke. The staff was very helpful and friendly aswell.; The only downside for me is that it seems a little bit overpriced for what we have, but it is very tasty!

I was taken here by a friend.; I'm not sure how is it "poke" but it's pretty good, especially for someone looking for a healthy meal.; Nice staffs.; The price is quite high I think.; It's pretty good although I don't think I will visit this place again. Not my type of food.

Got tired of big meals during business trip in Saigon, this poke bowl place brought me good appetite again! The ingredient are very fresh and healthy. Staff are friendly. Will def come back again for the good poke good !

This is a funky little, hard to find delight for the adventurous. It is a cash only poke place on the third floor of a very undistinguished building. The signage has been removed as a result of some government regulation, but persist and you will be rewarded. What they offer is what you read in the other reviews. It is all very fresh and there are lots of choices.
小店裝潢簡約可愛，沙拉飯美味可口，辣鮭魚鮪魚好開胃，在炎熱的胡志明可以吃看吃不同風味的料理～很推薦的小店喔！

Une vraie découverte pour nous. On compose comme on le souhaite sa poke bawl et c'est exquis !! Bien mieux qu'un Subway, c'est un repas équilibré, savoureux et orignal. Je recommande à 100% d'autant plus que le personnel est vraiment adorable.
Really good poke food, you can choose between a great variety of food as shown in the pictures. Very good personal!
Comptez 150k pour votre poke (sans extra). C'est très bon Et super original. L'accueil est en plus super agréable. C'est situé au 2eme étage de l'immeuble donc évitez de payer l'ascenseur.
Poke I took for my lunch was good and I think that they are serving fresh ingredients. Service they provide is good and workers in this place is fluent with English. it was nice :))

Having eaten poke frequently and from a fair few places in London, I can honestly say this place has the greatest variety of combos and is the only one that flavours each the fish, salad and rice with a different sauce for new levels of flavour. Hidden through an unassuming general entrance and up some stairs it potentially could be tricky to find but definitely worth a visit. Needs a small sign out front!

Not sure it deserves to be near the top of trip advisor restaurants in HCMC since there are so many great places to eat in the city, but it was definitely yummy. On par with poke I have had in London and Boston for a better price. Enjoy air conditioning inside or sit outside on a small deck area. Enjoyed it so much we almost went back a second time.

We had two poke bowls and one fresh coconut to drink.; 150.000 vnd each Poke bowl that you can garnish any way you like. Good selection of toppings.; 1) base: sushi rice, brown rice, salad or half rice half salad.; 2) protein choices: salmon, tuna, tofu, octopus, shrimps. With onions and cucumber or not.; 3) choice of sauce.; 4) any topping you like - vegetables, fruits, spices, crab; ; Plus the young woman preparing our bowls was super nice, spoke great English and guided us with the choices.
Look for Housnr 42, go inside, take the stairs, 2 floor. Its confusing, but dont worry its safe and delicious:-)
Food is so lovely and fresh. Make the effort to find this place — walk through street entrance and up stairs —; ; The staff are also very helpful and friendly.

Really good good, besides the traditional vietnamese meals. Fresh ingredients, you can choose. But don't be an idiot like me, and walk up in the eigth floor, its based on the second floor....No need for the elevator.

On a été dans ce resto grâce à TripAdvisor et franchement pas déçu. Le personnel est adorable et explique comment procéder pour faire sa poke bowl. Pour notre première on a pris les suggestions mais demain on la fera nous même !!!

Här får du möjlighet att själv välja dina ingredienser till den perfekta lunchen. Ligger lite klurigt till och man vandrar 2 våningar upp för att hitta hit. Entrén ligger likt bilden här. Sedan går man hela vägen in och trappan upp!; ; Helt värt att leta efter!; ; Personalen är fantastiskt duktiga på engelska och förklarar gärna hur man gör :)
Nourriture fraîche et excellente !; Comptez 200.000 par personne pour de belles portions avec jus de fruits.; Rapport qualité prix idéal.; Nous reviendrons !
Wir haben uns hier essen liefern lassen. Das Essen wurde pünktlich und in super Qualität geliefert. Geschmacklich top und frisch
Such a neat little shop with fresh poke additions. You have plenty of options including mango, pomegranate, corn, ect.
Das Poke Saigon ist etwas versteckt, aber die Suche hat sich gelohnt! Leckere und frische Poke Bowls und eine chillige Atmosphäre, das Ganze bei fairen Preisen.

Really amazing poke bowls. The ingredients are super fresh and they have a ton. The space itself is really clean and cute. The staff are extremely helpful and good at what they do. We have been twice in less than a week.
Best meal I had in Vietnam!!! And I was there for a month... A must! I can not recommend this place enough!
Great, healthy, fresh food, lovely atmosphere, and inexpensive menu! Great for a large or small group. No bar. Only beer is served.

Saigon Poke has been one of my favorites to order in, but I went into their Nguyen Hue restaurant recently and discovered a great little place to enjoy some of my favorite food... their options are varied and so fresh, it's always very satisfying. I hear they have a new location on Ly Tu Trong Street so I will definitely have to check it out. I highly recommend!
Fabulous fresh food. Very friendly and helpful staff. We had never had a poke bowl before and the girls were very patient. Food was delicious. Definitely worth finding... so glad we did.

This little hidden gem needs is something you won't miss when in Ho Chi Minh! There is a lot of different opportunities for customizing your own pokebowl. Try it! And of course an extra plus that the food there is extremely aesthetic as well!
Waren 4 mal dort. Fairer Preis für leckeres frisches Essen. Absolut guter Service. Sehr hilfsbereit.

I was so pleasantly surprised by this place. Its a fast food place in the M Plaza almost food court, so I was not expecting to be so impressed. You can customize your own bowl or choose off the menu. The ingredients are all so fresh, and the tastes blend together really well. This was a really delicious, quick, well priced, and I assume healthy, meal!
Food there is delicious, staff is very friendly. Definitely recommend! If you are in Ho Chi Minh you have to step in!

We came here based on the reviews and our only disappointment was they had “run out of beer”...Oh well, the poke made up for it. 150kVND gets you a bowl of rice (brown or white), salad, 2-seafood poke & a variety of add-ones. My wife couldn’t finish her spicy tuna & salmon w/ brown rice bowl (good for me...I helped her). The bowls are refreshing and an innovative, yet healthy change from normal. My ahi tuna & octopus poke was GREAT! This place is REALLY hard to find...off the street, up a narrow alley, up 3-flights of stairs (they have an elevator). Use Google Maps!! They just opened a new location too - 42 Ly Tu Tron nearby! I would have awarded 5 stars...but...you CANNOT run out of beer in HCMC!

We’ve never try Hawaiian food before and these bowls were amazing! They’re located in the second floor of a building that doesn’t look too nice from the outside but has many lovely stores on the inside. The food size is regular, the price isn’t that cheap, but the flavor is espectacular. And if you’re feeling hungry afterwards you can just go and try the coffee shops that are on the 3rd floor.; ; We try to go a 2nd time but it was full! Will definitively come back on a next trip to Vietnam.

Cozy little place with modern interior that serves great poke. You get your choice of two different rices or salad or a combination of both  . After that you chose poke, sauce, toppings, and something crispy. The staff has impeccable English and is super duper friendly and happy to explain or help you with whatever you’re wondering.; ; Also, there’s unlimited toppings (like bottomless mimosas, but more healthy!); ; It’s a little bit hard to find location wise, but walk in through the dark opening on 42, where some locals sit, it looks abandoned, but then you take the stairs 2 flights up and you’re here.; ; Definitely go here for lunch!

The restaurant is conveniently located in a quiet spot and serves really nice food. The quality of the ingredients is high and you can create your own poke (unlimited toppings)!! My vegetarian one was 120k, cheap for foreigners but overpriced for locals... nice alternative to fried rolls and noodles!!!
Very hidden restaurant in the first floor. Great idea and so delicious. Has all the salads and they were fabulous, I couldn’t eat it all
Poke Saigon is a hidden gem and well worth a visit! The staff are really friendly, inside is very clean/pleasant with comfortable seating and best of all are the Poke bowls - delicious!
What a amazing food! My friends took me there and it changed my food life! Find it and go for a the best fish bowl ever!
A perfect place for a perfect poke bowl!; Very friendly staff!; Great food; Fantastiskt bra lunchrestaurang med otroligt god mat

Poke Saigon is clean and inviting, but perhaps a bit hard to find. The entrance is through a scooter parking area and up a flight of stairs and down a corridor. Once we found it though, we were greeted with decent choices for salad and grain bases, poke of many sorts, and lots of toppings and sauces, all for a reasonable price. The only objection: the bowls could be bigger, not in terms of quantity of food----the bowls were filling and tasty---but in terms of being too tight for mixing. The staff were friendly and helpful. Go here when you need a poke fix!

It’s like any Pokebowl place in Sweden from look, not taste. Just that they speak English, are service minded and the bowls looks nice. But taste-wise their are other Japanese restaurants that are better. Overrated place because it looks nice.

What a revelation....I had picked this place for lunch as it was near our hotel (The reverie) It was a bit hard to find and if not for one picture I had seen on here of the entrance, we may not have found it. Its in the building that looks like an old apartment, with various businesses on many floors. You walk into the building off the street and it doesn't look like your walking into anything, but once you take the elevator up or walk up the stairs you start to see the businesses. Poke was on the second floor, and was a very small shop. It was well worth the effort as it was kind of like a subway (for us NA) where you picked your base (salad, brown rice, sticky rice or combo of each) and then added the ingredients you wanted. It was so simple, but so yummy. It was so good we came back the next day for lunch again. If you are anywhere nearby make the effort to find it. You will be glad you did.

Das kleine Restaurant ist versteckt und schwer zu finden. Doch die Suche lohnt sich! Die Bedienung ist sehr zuvorkommend und das Essen, mit frischen Zutaten, hervorragend. Fleischesser kommen hier nicht auf ihre Rechnung. Doch gibts dafür 4 verschiedene Fischarten zur Auswahl.; Gerne wieder!
Super Location, liegt versteckt und ohne Tripadvisor wären wir nicht dorthingegangen! Man kann sich die Poke Bowls frisch nach eigenem Geschmack zusammenstellen. Es war sehr lecker :)

Fantastic poke bowls with a large variety of different toppings. I tried many poke bowls in SG and other countries, but these at Poke Saigon is for sure top 3. As I know this is the only place in SG with cold rice and not warm. This gives another food experience and is better for my taste buds. Worth visit or takeaway.
We can only recommend this place!! The bowls are with super fresh ingredients and are very tastefull. Small search but easy to find —> enter the white building nr 42, go 2floors up and turn right.

Fancied something a bit healthier so we thought we would give this place a go as it had such good reviews. So glad we did as the food was really fresh and tasty! The staff were so friendly and explained to people how it works to build your poke bowl. This is a little difficult to find and the building looks a little odd but once inside it’s fine! Would highly recommend.

We came as a group of 4 and we surely had an amazing lunch. Fantastic food and friendly staff. The only thing that let us down is it was so hot inside. Really hope that it would be better next time I visit this place. Highly recommend to everyone.
The food was fresh and the helping was very filling. The staff are friendly (go Vi) and speak good English. Highly recommended for a healthy lunch.

Despite the elevator dude trying to charge us a dollar each to go up to the third floor we were excited to try this place out.. And for the most part it didn't disappoint.. Nice presentation, plenty of toppings, fresh fish and a cool vibe made for a culinary experience that was actually pretty pretty pretty good..
Great food, good prices. Highly recommend. Walk up through the unassuming entrance (in the images) to the second floor of the small centre inside.
狹小的樓層間，竟然有這樣舒適的空間，有世外桃源的Feel; 所有食材自己選擇，由工作人員幫你服務，; 新鮮蔬食搭配著醬料再配上糙米和鮮蝦鮭魚; 這樣的口感真的很不錯，清爽不油膩 ! !; 滿滿一碗 15萬越盾 台幣約200元~ 值得 ! !

I went here many times. Everytime the taste can satisfy me with the balance of the food. Fresh and healthy. The staff is friendly also.; ; Just a small thing is that the bowl is too small for me I jave to say. It's difficult to mix the ingredients without spiling out something on the table. (for me, even one single seaweed, it still delicious); ; Say, can you run some promotion for lunch? The price is quite high for an office lunch if we eat daily *laugh*
Nous avons suivis les avis TripAdvisor et honnêtement nous n’avons pas été déçu ! Très frais c’était delicieux ! Je recommande cette adresse et j’espère pouvoir y retourner !

Dit mag je niet missen tijdens je trip in Saigon.; Ontzettend lekker gegeten en tegen een zeer redelijke prijs.; De bediening is erg aardig en het concept is heel erg goed.; ; Echt heerlijk gegeten.; ; Niet al te moeilijk te vinden, maar net als sommige restaurants een uitdaging omdat het niet aan de straat ligt.; ; Wat een heerlijke smaken. Ik heb echt bijna alles in mijn bowl laten stoppen.; Heerlijk met een biertje erbij. Dit is relaxed eten!

The best place I found while living in Saigon for Poke. Very fresh ingredients and all of the sauces are excellent. Fresh juices are also available. On average the customer service is decent to friendly. Great serving sizes.

Wir kennen Poke bisher nur aus Deutschland und waren überrascht ein Poke Restaurant in Saigon zu finden. Es ist nicht ganz einfach zu finden. Man muss erst durch ein schmales Treppenhaus in den zweiten Stock und dann dort auf der rechten Seite.; Die Bedienung ist super freundlich und erklärt alles ganz genau. Die Pokes schmecken super lecker. Wir hätten jeder gleich noch eine essen können. Absolut empfehlenswert.

Carina l’idea della ciotola in cui combinare riso stile sushi e vari ingredienti crudi: pesce, verdure, frutta, salse e topping croccante. Da bere succhi freschi senza aggiunte. Il risultato è un piatto buono e salutare. Ho dato 3 pallini perché il prezzo è alto rispetto alla tipologia di locale (no servizio) e alla quantità, quindi non ci si sente pienamente soddisfatti e si ha la sgradevole impressione di pagare l’idea trendy. Personalmente preferisco sempre un’esperienza piu’ alla buona ma anche più autentica e sostanziosa.; Affascinante lo stabile in cui si trova il locale.
Moeilijk te vinden. Je moet door een soort garage met scooters, trap op en even vragen. Maar als je er bent: vers, schoon en heerlijk. Prima maaltijden die je zelf kunt samenstellen. Aanrader.

土曜日のお昼時に行きましたが、そこまで混んでおらず普通に座れました。; どうやって頼むの？と店員さんに聞いたら丁寧に教えてくれて、一緒に選びましょう言ってくれたので助かりました！！英語が話せる店員さんばかりだったので助かりました。; ご飯、魚、ソース、トッピングなどを自分で選んで注文します。いろいろたくさんあるので選ぶのがちょっと大変でしたが、楽しかったです。; お値段は150Kと、安くはないですが、ベトナム料理以外でヘルシーなものが食べたくなったらここに来るといいかもしれないです。

Zum Glück sind wir durch Tripadvisor auf dieses Restaurant aufmerksam geworden - das Essen war einfach super lecker und wir wurden total freundlich bei der Auswahl der Zutaten beraten. Absolut empfehlenswert!

I finally discovered Poke Saigon after seeing it on Trip Advisor and Google Maps recommendations for a few months. It's up a few floors ioff Nguyen Hue and well worth looking for it. Great, fresh ingredients in an intimate little shop amongst other small businesses. Great food.
Best poke in town! The food was very good. Large choice of veggies, fruits and topping.; The staff is friendly, speak good English and explain very well the concept.; We will visit again for sure !

Hands down best food i have had on this holiday! Great reasturant to come for lunch with a small group of friends. It is a hidden gem with great food, great vibes and fresh ingredients! Highly recommend!
The staff were friendly and very attentive and lets just say the food was just what we wanted and expected. Thank you for the wonderful dinning experience.
For a quick meal with decent options for toppings, this poke bowl is in a rustic building that’s hidden near Saigon tower. Level 2, just a quick walk up for this hole in a wall meal
hidden gem that offers super tasty poke!; fresh ingredients, large variety of different toppings, attentive staff. quality food for fair price.; the perfect place - highly recommend!
Nothing what I expected. But really clean and very nice. Love the way you get to mix n match your toppings. Just the right proportions. Lovely experience.

Tucked away in a little corner, this hidden gem is a must try when in HCM. Go early if you like tuna as they run out quickly and experiment with some of the toppings.; a quick meal, well worth the price
Went for lunch a few days ago - very fresh and tasty vegetarian bowl. Nice space - good deco and comfortable for a quick lunch.

My wife and I enjoyed our lunch here. It was epic. Perfect salad lunch (especially after eating a lot of Pho over the last week or so); ; All the food looked super fresh and what I ate tasted fresh too.; ; Good sized portion of food.; ; Staff were friendly and helpful when it came to ordering food and helped select items which would go with what I had ordered.; ; Well worth a visit. I would definitely eat here weekly if I wasn't here on holiday!

Great healthy and very tasty salad bowl. Up 2 flights, can be tricky to find so street address and number very helpful. Friendly smiley workers and lovely clean, light and airy atmosphere off the hustle and bustle of the street. Will come again.

We had a great time here. A bit hidden but easy to find once you take the stairs/elevator. Staff was really friendly and made us feel welcome. We picked a nice poke bowl together from all the options. It tasted amazing!

I’ve eaten a lot of Poke in my hometown (Bay Area, California) so if I like it, then Poke Saigon should get a full 5-Stars. After all, this is Saigon. There’s not enough Poke place in this city to compete with. The place is well air conditioning, that’s a must to keep the raw ingredients fresh. The restaurant is kept clean, has bright natural lighting and nice decor. The protein choices are basic, but there are many add ons and sauces to make a beautiful healthy bowl of Poke. The only complaint I have is that the bowl is too small for the amount of goodness it tries to contain. Totally impossible to mix and eat your Poke without spilling over.

So I rated for them. But the food is really good, of course it's more expensive than other places but it's worth the money. Really nice tuna cubes, the mangoes are . Yeah probably might comeback for more.
We had just 2 days in Saigon and we eat twice at the poke Saigon ! So clean and fresh. The staff was friendly! What a good experience.
Lovely food. Many different things to choose in between. The fish taste is amazing!; Nice place, but a bit hard to find, from the street
This place was difficult to find but It was worth the struggle. The poke bowl was really tasty and healthy.

Poke provides the best way to get what you really need. It allows half portions that can be combined with other ingredients as your base food such as brown or white rice with salad or just purely rice or purely salad. It has a variety of healthy toppings to choose from along with tons of options for sauces. Incredibly tasty according to your likes. Definitely recommendable!

We visited Poke Saigon with our daughter and had such a great time. Getting into the resto is interesting because you walk through a motorbike garage and up the stairs but once you get inside it’s amazing! The resto is clean and fresh and the poke is so good! They even made a little bowl for our daughter (just rice and edamame). If we’re back in hcmc we will definitely visit again!
food is fresh and the host is super nice. Will visit again. It is easy to find. in the 2ed floor of cafe apartment. You must come and try it in person.

We eat a quick lunch here and it was awesome. All ingredient was fresh and delicious. The staff was extremely friendly. They helped me to find my own poke. The location of the place is perfect in the middle of the city. And if you go in the building do not afraid. Go up to the first floor.; ; Highly recommend.
Super Idee im Hawaianischen Stil. Die Mitarbeiterinnen konnten gut englischund erklärten alles. Das Essen war sehr gut und sehr günstig. Von mir volle Punktzahl.

The Best Poke in Saigon. Very good price, excellent quality also, fresh salmon, crab salad is amazing taste, delivery on right schedule time.; If you want to eat the best poke in Saigon, Poke Saigon is the place.
Le restau est un peu en retrait de la rue, ça fait parti de son charme. Les plats étaient bons, très frais et les serveurs sont très gentils et parlent bien anglais

Wie viele Lokale in Saigon liegt auch dieses in der ersten Etage und ist somit nicht auf den ersten Blick zu finden; leckere Auswahl an frischen Zutaten; tolle Beratung bei der Zusammenstellung der individuellen Schale; sehr nettes Personal und tolles Ambiente
Veldig god mat, gode råvarer og nydelige smaker. Kan velge innhold selv og få akkurat det du vil, alt for en hver smak! I tillegg er prisen veldig fin
Любезный персонал,подскажут и помогут побрать ваш поук,все продукты вкусные и свежие,место приятное,советуем к посещению,за две порции отдали 13$
Il faut de la ténacité pour trouver ce petit restaurant dans un couloir au deuxième étage d’un immeuble qui ne paye pas de mine. Produits très frais, pas énormément de choix mais pratique et rapide.

Tolles Essen, unglaublich nette Bedienung und süße Location! Du kannst dir ähnlich wie beim Frozen Joghurt, aus vielen verschiedenen Sachen was zusammen stellen. Grundlage bildet dabei Reis und Salat. Danach kommt deine Fleischwahl ( in meinem Fall Tofu), deine Soße und so viele Toppings wie du möchtest! ( Mango, Sesam, Bohnen, Tomaten etc.). Für jeden Geschmack was dabei und günstig !!
Ah, il faut le trouver celui-là !! Merci Tripadvisor...; Très sympa, excellent accueil et cuisine très fraîche.; Vraiment à faire. Succès mérité.
Lite klurigt att hitta på andra våningen men så värt ett besök! Gör en egen bowl eller ta någon av de färdiga favoriterna.

Super petit resto. Les produits sont frais, de qualité. Le personnel est souriant et prend bien le temps d'expliquer les différents ingrédients. C'est un régal.; ; Attention, petite subtilité le resto est au deuxième étages d'un gros bâtiment.

Sehr sehr gutes Essen! Und das sage ich als jemand der normalerweise keinen Salat isst. Aber da gibt es so viel gute Variationen mit oder ohne Fisch und extrem gute Saucen obendrauf. Auch sehr sättigend! Absolut gut

Nous avons trouvé cette adresse bien cachée (car oui c'est dans une ruelle à l'étage d'un petit parking) au hasard. Et tant mieux ! Personnel adorable qui nous aiguille dans la commande et repas succulent ! Bref un incontournable à HCMC pour le lunch.

Long story short:; Es war der Hammer! Frisch, lecker und gesund! Tolles Konzept und sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Bedienungen.; Preis-Leistung ist klasse!; ; Das einzige Problem ist, das Restaurant zu finden. Es liegt quasi in einem Hinterhof und nur ein (viel zu kleines) Schild am Durchgang macht auf das Restaurant aufmerksam.

さすが色々な国の食事が食べられるホーチミンです。ハワイアンのポキが食べられるお店がありました。一食150Kドンなので、ローカルの食事と比べるとなかなかの値段はしますが、サラダ感覚で美味しく食べられます。今回初めての訪問だったのでお店の人にオーダーの仕方を聞きました。まずボウルのベースとなる土台を寿司飯かサラダか選びます。ハーフ&ハーフも可。次に魚を2種選び、ソースを決めたら、それを和えてくれ、ボウルの土台の上に載せます。その後はお好きなトッピングを山盛りに載せてもらって出来上がり。レジで、ドリンクを飲むならその分をプラスして支払います。あとはテラスで食べるも良し、クーラーの効いた店内で食べるも良し。ヘルシーだけど結構お腹いっぱいになります。お店が駐輪場の奥の階段を上がった1st floorなので通りからは分かりません。探してみてください。
可以自行挑選任何你想要的食材，例如有生魚片、蝦子、石榴、鳳梨、芒果……等等，可選你想要的醬汁，最後可以再灑上芝麻，味道不錯

Sehr, sehr leckeres, gesundes und abwechslungsreiches Angebot! Die Bowls sind super lecker, alle Zutaten sind pfiffig gewürzt und daa Personal ist freundlich, hilfsbereit und spricht gutes Englisch.; Etwas schwierig zu finden, aber die Suche lohnt sich! Einfach nach der Hausnummer 42 schauen, den Flur hinein zur ersten Treppe, dann in den 2. Stock gehen und genießen!

Place is hard to find (if you see some people inside what looks like a parking garage waiting for an elevator, go up the stairs behind them, 2nd floor turn right), but so worth it. Brown rice, salmon in sweet and sour sesame sauce with cucumber tomato onion sauerkraut and mango Delish!

Poke中文譯為夏威夷蓋飯，來自美國夏威夷料理，以醃製生魚塊、涼菜、海藻等覆蓋在米飯上，而隨著日本移民、遊客熱愛夏威夷，日式美食文化也影響Poke發展。; 首先，先確認你要的份量，再來是選擇米飯，有壽司米、糙米與沙拉三種選項，店員英文相當流利，會導引你選擇上面蓋飯配料與醬汁。; 吃第一口確實很驚艷，清爽不油膩好適合夏季當主餐，加上各種蔬菜、海鮮、藻類與水果，熱量控制及營養滿分，適合帶小朋友同行前往用餐。
Excellent, fresh ingredients, perfect for a quick lunch. The host was also quite friendly and welcoming.

This place is perfect for a fresh lunch or dinner on a hot day in Saigon. It’s a bit tricky to find but so worth it! Our favorites was the brown rice, salmon, mango and seaweed. The staff will take good care of you if you’re new to pokebowls and their english is spot on. Would definitly go back if I had the chance.
It was a wonderful meal and small little restaurant it’s kinda hidden but worth the time to explore the building it is in
Give your stomach the health boost it deserves with this wonderful treat! Absolutely delicious poke bowls. If you never had one- you must try it. If you had poke before- this will not disappoint!

You get a poke bowl that is jam packet with whatever you choose.; You pay per poke (fish choice, 2 is minimum). All the vegetables and other delicious adds are unlimited.; They really pack the bowl to the max and the girls that work there are super friendly. Also try their juice, it’s really good!
Nice atmosphere, passionate crew, fresh ingredients, flavours on fleek, cool location (walk through a moped store from the street front); ; A place Worth breaking the backpacker budget for.
ハワイアンのお店です。; そこそこの値段はしますが、美味しいです。; 住所の表記は2Fとなっていますが、日本でいうところの3階です。; 場所は少し分かりにくいので要注意。; ベトナムMMというデリバリーアプリでも注文できるようです。
Super delicious food. Really fun to mix and match your own bowl. Loved the spicy salmon. Staff was very friendly. Will definitely come back again before leaving Vietnam!

We stumbled across Saigon whilst on a hunt for donuts. Only staying in Ho Chin Minh for one night and one day between trips we needed something fresh and delicious for an early lunch and this REALLY hit the spot. The service is amazing and the food even better. My partner had tofu and I had spicy tuna and salmon with all the trimmings. Would recommend a thousand times and more. 12/10

Delicious poke bowls- everything was great and so fresh! Tofu available for vegetarians. The women working there were also very helpful and gave us advice for our trip here. Pressed juice and coconuts also great. Nice bathroom inside.; ; This place is hard to find though! It’s on the 2/3 floor of a building w many places.

At poke Saigon we founded exactly what we were looking for: healthy, tasty and energetic food.; The place is cute and the staff is just lovely! They gave us lots of good tips about the city.; The food suits every taste, and they have a great variety of seafood, toppings, salads,rice.. all served in an original coconut bowl!; I recommend the guacamole and the tuna, amazing!

I love poke, and this place is great! The people working there are so sweet, and really make your experience better. It Has so many options of what you can put on it, and has so many great flavors. I recommend the Tuna and the Spicy Salmon. Has a modern look which is cool to see in Vietnam. In my experience with Ho Chi Minh the price isn't bad at all. It is 150 K for a bowl..so 7 USD. I pay around $10 in the US for Poke so I really don't mind paying this price. This is worth every penny, anyone complaining about the price doesn't know poke. Just a real quality restaurant. The only thing I wish was that the physical bowl size was a little bigger so I could mix it better. I have been twice, and I plan on going one more time while I'm in Ho Chi Minh. I LOVE POKE SAIGON!!! GO THERE!! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
Dans la moiteur de Saigon, une adresse sympathique pour déjeuner d'une bonne salade de produits frais avec un accueil sympathique.

Went here with friends and had an amazing dinner! A great selection of food and the overall impression of the place was that it was very fresh. The staff was so sweet and spoke perfect english which was great for us since we have had a hard time to order food in Vietnam earlier, due to the language barrier. The only negative thing is that it was hard to find since it’s located inside of another building.
Nguyên liệu rất tươi và đa dạng, nhân viên cũng nhiệt tình hỗ trợ mình trong việc chọn nguyên liệu. Nhất định sẽ quay lại!!

This is a great option for lunch. You pick a range of ingredients (many of which you would never normally try) and take to a table in a bowl. The food is superb and the staff are excellent, guiding and advising. 2nd one I have tried in Vietnam. Could take the world by storm!
One of the best food experiences I have ever had! A colourful and healthy poke is what I was looking for and I found it in Saigon! A must-try is also the yummy pitaya bowl!

Wir haben das Poke Saigon nach längerem Suchen entdeckt und waren total begeistert. Alles wird frisch zubereitet und die Soßen sind Hammer (vor allem Wasabi Mayo). Wir werden während unseres Aufenthalts in Saigon sicher nochmal dort essen.
Lecker, gesund, superfriendly staff. Eingang kaum zu erkennen, links von der Bücherei hinter ins Treppenhaus und nach oben LAUFEN, Aufzug kostet und ist nicht nötig. Secret wonderland
The best restaurant on our trip to Asia! Absolutely loved the place and especially the food. Perfect!
Det är allt man önskar när man vill ha en poke bowl! Det är en buffe av goda fräscha toppingar och allt var supergott!!
Otroligt god mat, bra utbud, trevlig och hjälpsam personal. Var lite svårt att hitta, men helt klart värt ett besök!!

Jag kan varm rekommendera detta ställe om du är sugen på en riktigt god poke bowl. Tjejen bakom disken var proffsig och trevlig.; ; Stället kan vara lite svårt att hitta då det inte finns någon skylt utanför men kolla efter denna ingången så har du hittat rätt.
Thanks so much for gave me the good food in town and I will go back for food in short time nearly. I never had this style of vegetable when I live in Rome. Will try to making one.
Lekker gegeten hier. Verse Ingrediënten. En Eindelijk wordt er geen 15% services kosten gerekend. Wel is het eventjes zoeken.
Pas facile à trouver, au deuxième étage. Fiez-vous à l'adresse 42, et ensuite l'escalier est au fond. Très bon, frais, bonne portion.
Das Essen ist einfach Mega lecker, das Restaurant ist etwas versteckt, im 2. Stock! Besuch lohnt sich sehr

It’s a bit tricky to find ( through a scooter garage up to the second floor ) but worth it. Staff spoke excellent English, explaining the choices, how to build the bowl and engaged us in general chit chat. Food was raw, fresh and flavoursome. A bit more than we usually pay to eat but worth it now and then.

Excellent service with great recommendations for the bowl. I do not eat seafood but the tofu bowl was amazing. The options to customize the bowl were excellent and the whole bowl was healthy and delicious. I loved the atmosphere and the staff were friendly and kind! I’d come back in a heartbeat!

This is a must on your visit to ho chi mihn City. Its a little hard to find but just go up the stairs to the left of the book store. The poke bowls are delicious as are the fresh juices. The staff are really nice and it's overall a lovely experience that is inexpensive.

Situated in the apartment cafe block. Build your own salad/rice bowl place. 5 choices of different rice with a variety salad options. 240,000 for 2 bowls (roughly £7). Free WiFi. Great quick lunch for vegetarians and vegans also

A bit difficult to find, but you will be rewarded once you do. You can’t beat a create your own poke bowl! A wide range of amazing fresh ingredients to fully customize to your liking. Very friendly staff will walk you through it and offer some suggestions as well! You don’t want to miss this place!

The food is delicious here!! I highly recommend coming. You get to pick everything that goes into your bowls from a variety of different toppings and bases. I absolutely loved it. & it’s a great way to find something quick and healthy to eat.; ; It’s hard to find - there’s an alley to the left of the book store, once in there head up a couple flights of stairs and you’ll see it.
Diverse ingredients and fresh food, lovely staff and enthusiastic help, the restaurant is beautifully decorated with fresh feeling
Utrolig god og sunn mat servert raskt! Hyggelige ansatte som snakker og forstår engelsk. Litt vanskelig å finne stedet første gang, men ellers veldig koselig lokale!

This was an unusual eating experience. The Poke bowls here are a fusion of Vietnamese, Japanese and Hawaiian food. You can design your own bowl from the vast array of very fresh and delicious ingredients or you can select one of the pre existing combinations. The staff are great at explaining it all. For us, this was a highlight of the food in Saigon. There is also another of these restaurants in Hanoi which we will definitely look for when we are there.
It was really nice I totally enjoyed here with my friends although it was much for me  thanks so much
Leckerstes Essen in ganz Vietnam! Man kann sich alle Zutaten selbst zusammenstellen, eine Schüssel kostet 150000 Dong! Absolut empfehlenswert

Die Bowls sind einfach der Hammer. Der Fisch ist von sehr guter Qualität. Der Lachs und Thunfisch zerschmelzen auf der Zunge.; Alle Zutaten sind super frisch und das Team ist auch freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir kommen wieder!

In (Poke) Hanoi werd mij verteld dat er ook een Poke Saigon is. Ook hier moest ik dat natuurlijk proeven en het smaakte weer superlekker en vers! Ik heb er avond gegeten en de dag erna een take away gehaald voor naar het vliegveld.; ; De bediening is heel vrolijk en vriendelijk en helpt je graag bij het samenstellen van je poke bowl. Laat je niet afschrikken door de entree. Het zit in een gebouw met meerdere restaurantjes en café’s. Je vindt Poke Saigon op de tweede verdieping (bereikbaar via trap en lift).
Quick simple fresh food which tasted delicious and lots of options to make a bowl of pleasure. We have struggled to get such salad options in Vietnam.
İnanılmaz bir yer, lezzetli yemekler, mutlaka bir kere uğrayın, ilgi mükemmel, fiyatları makul, temiz bir yer.

Aliments frais, portion généreuse, nous avons adoré ! Nous avons trouvé l'endroit grâce aux commentaires sur TripAdvisor, autrement, l'endroit n'est pas visible de la rue. Nous recommandons vivement !

mình tình cờ biết đến nhà hàng qua 1 người bạn, tò mò nên đến ăn thử, khá bất ngờ vì nhà hàng set up mọi thứ rất dễ thương, đồ ăn tươi và đa dạng, có phục vụ cả các món chay. nv nhiệt tình và rất nhẹ nhàng và nhiệt tình tư vấn cho khách hàng khi chọn nguyên liệu.
The food is amazing and also the service. Everything is so fresh and at a good price. You will find it on the 2nd floor. The people in there talk English, great service, And a great attitude.
First of all. The food was amazing. The price was fair conciderd the quality of what you get. Furthermore the staff is polite, friendly and efficient.

I literally drive 40 minutes to come here. This is the best place for good, tasty food. We absolutely love it here. I go every time I am in Ho Chi Minh.They have great vegetarian options and it's cheaper - yaaay <3 We would definitely highly recommend this to anyone craving a bowl of raw, fresh goodness

Looking for a light lunch on a quiet clean restaurant that has a normal washroom? This is a lovely little spot with great staff. It's small and simple but freshly made salads with ingredients you select yourself - inexpensive.; ; Tip? There is an elevator as it's in the second floor, but you have to pay a few dong to use it!

Als je even een verse pokebowl wilt moet je hier zijn, heerlijk gegeten. We konden zelf alles samenstellen en de dames waren erg vriendelijk!; ; Laat je niet afschrikken door de ingang want die is best vreemd (zie foto). Het is een verzamelgebouw met allerlei tentjes!; ; Erg leuk en zeker een aanrader!
Sehr zu empfehlen!! Perfekter frischer Salat in allen Variationen, kann individuell zusammengestellt werden.
Schwer zu finden. In der zweiten Etage. Es lohnt sich zu suchen. Stellt euch eure Bowl selbst zusammen. Alles frisch und super lecker. Nette Leute und alles easy.

Totally agreed it's healthy food with selections among vegetables, salmon, rice, sauce, beans.... At my viewpoint, i'm not comfortable when they mixed everything into 1 bowl. I prefer at least 3 separates such as: salad with sauces, rice with beans and salmon. Anyway, a strange taste but not sure to visit again.
Se siete a Saigon, andate a mangiare a POKE SAIGON, merita davvero! e se siete ad Hanoi, andate a POKE HANOI!

The place is a little hard to find - look for 42 Nguyen Hue, it's a small entrance, and go two stories up (ground-1-2), then it's on the right. The ingredients are amazingly fresh, the staff is super helpful, the place is nicely airconed and spacious. For a fresh and nutritious lunch/dinner it's an amazing place, and won't break your budget. Highly recommended!
Heerlijk verse pokebowls!; Alles is proper en goed verzorgd!; Laat je niet afschrikken door de entree. Het restaurant bevindt zich op de eerste verdieping.

The ingredients for these Poke bowls were as fresh as they could be and very delicious! It was my first time trying this type of dish and I think I found a new favorite here :) Many different toppings to choose from (some of them very unusual), fresh and flavorful fish, delicious sauces and refreshing juices. This place is number one on TripAdvisor for a reason!; Just a little “warning”: it’s a little hard to find the place because it is located on the first floor of a building and the sign is only very small. Totally worth not giving up the search though!!
Nice, fresh, good taste! I really liked the quite environment and that you didn't hear all the noise of the traffic.; ; Very helpful and friendly staff!
Amazing place. So many healthy options! Lovey staff! Highly recommend. 150,000 dong for a bowl (£4) I’ll be there for dinner toooo!!
不要懷疑 就在咖啡公寓二樓; 搭電梯 出來右手邊 再走幾個階梯上去; 走樓梯應該比較快 不用等; 菜單清楚明瞭 小妹妹顧店

Wenn man mal keine Lust auf typisch vietnamesische Küche hat, sind die Poke Bowls hier eine super Abwechslung. Die Bedienungen sind alle superlieb und zuvorkommend, Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt auch auf jeden Fall.
Great food, excellent service.; Pokebowl was very fresh and they are very generous with the portions.; Special thanks to the hostess whose english was great!

Das feine Restaurant ist wie auch schon in Hanoi sehr versteckt im 1 Stockwerk.; Die Bedienung ist super freundlich und berät bei der Zusammenstellung der Poke sehr gut. Es war alles sehr frisch zubereitet und sehr schmackhaft. Der einzige ort6an dem ich rohen Fisch esse. Es war sehr ruhig dort und schön gestaltet.; Werden auf alle Fälle wieder kommen
The food is very tasty, fresh, and plenty of choices. The staff is efficient and nice. recommended!!!

The Poké-Bowl was soooo good! We payed 150’000 Dong and could choose from all ingridients except from two. The staff is very friendly and nice, listens to all your wishes and had put togheter a so yummie Poké-Bowl!; Spot is hidden and can not be found easily because there is no sign on the street. Price is a bit high for vietnamese standards.
獨自一人不知道要吃什麼，無意間發現的餐廳，配菜選擇很多，平價又健康，吃飯期間有各國的人來用餐，店員英文很好，很有耐心的解釋怎麼點餐

I have never heard of Poke until i visited HCMC this year with my girlfriend and it didnt disappoint.; ; I have attached some pictures of the building it is in as its hard to find.; ; Ita 150k VND for a Poke bowl ao expensive by locak standards but cheal by Western.; ; You can pick a base, fish/meat, sauce a d toppings to go on your poke bowl.; ; Definitely worth a look if you are exploring down town HCMC.; ; Pooookeeee Boooowllll
Very fresh, healthy, amazing food!!; Friendly staff! This first poke bowl won't be my last one, that's for sure! Perfect way to end my day exploring HCMC! Thanks!
Delicious bowls of yum. We had to wait a few minutes for a table but were offered a free drink which was great. Would definitely recommend
Wow! What a great restaurant in Siagon. I loved my bowl which I customized with half salad and rice. The toppings are out of this world and the fresh squeezed juices are refreshing.

Nutritious and delicious.; ; A great find from reviews on trip advisor unfortunately the location makes it tricky to find but it's in a big block next to a lot of other shops/restaurants.; ; The staff were very friendly and helpful and offer advice on what will complement your poke bowl.

Place was a lil hard to find but you can probably refer to one of photos in the gallery to find entrance of the building.; ; We were greeted with a vibrant interior decor and two smiley service staff.
