Though they may not be proficient in English, they were very hospitable and chatty.; ; The order menu is user friendly and offers a huge selection of base, sides and sauces.; ; I've order a mix of brown rice with lettuce, 1+2 extra servings of salmon sashimi cubes with onion, cucumber, guacamole, wakame, nori, mango, edamame, cherry tomato as sides and coriander, spring onions as toppings .; ; I have no complaint for the taste and I was shocked by the price of the total bill as we have only paid ~500k dong for 3 poke bowls and 1 coconut.; ; Ratings in a nutshell:; ; Ambience: 4/5; Food: 5/5; Service: 5/5; Price: 6/5; Revisit: Yes!; ; We have even gone on to order two additional poke bowls as takeaways for our snack later in the day. Will definitely revisit if given a chance to do so.

We had lunch today, it was very crowded and we had to wait. But when we started to order, the girl served us really friendly, she sorry for our waiting and carefully introduced the food for us. The food was amazing, fresh and delicous. Lots of choices for the topping. Highly recommend!

So delicious and fresh. I love vegetables. This is the best place to visit with friendly and helpful staff. My friend discovered this speacial type of food concept like a mix of Japanese and Hawaiian food. Would highly recommend

We discovered this place originally while in Hanoi and we were amazed and were shocked to find the Saigon branch was better with a bigger selection, staff couldn’t help more either was a pleasure and would def go again

We ate here yesterday evening and it was really really tasty and healthy. You can create your own bowl and the two girls spoke perfect English and were super helpful. So when you are here in hoc Hi minh and want to eat a healthy and delicious food, you have to come here.; The price is a bit higher then the vietmanese food, but the ingredients are all fresh and we paid for 2 bowls 270.000 vdn - approx. 10 Euro.; ; Go here!

This ppace was great but we passed it at least three times because it is on the 2nd floor of an old building and there are literally ZERO signs to let you know it exists. They need better signage outside on the street and they could benefit by sending flyers and coupons to the neighbor shops as we asked in two places and they had never heard of this place.; ; Restaurant is clean, open and service very friendly.

Besøkte stedet for lunsj hvor jeg fikk en nydelig poke bowl med ferske og gode råvarer. Hvis man er på jakt etter noe som både er sunt og godt så er dette stedet! Betjeningen er også utrolig hyggelig.
We had the 'Saigonese' poke bowl. Yum yum yum!; Absolutely DELICIOUS! And the staff are amazing - so chatty, friendly, welcoming and helpful.; Definitely recommend this place.;

Super friendly staff. The bowls are delicious and very fresh which is exactly what we felt like. The lady serving us went out of her way to let us know if we want any extra sauces as we were eating to let her know and she’d top us up for free. Great value if you feel like a “western-y” meal that’s delicious, filling and healthy.
We met Uyen she very friendly and helpful especially food was so fresh and tastesty. Highly recommend this place.

It is the best poke place I have been at. You can make your own or choose one made by menu. There was much fish in it and not only salad. The service was also very good and the staff was so sweet and friendly.
Heerlijk en vers! We zijn hier twee keer gaan eten omdat het zo lekker is. Ze hebben sinds kort ook een tweede locatie 10 min verderop.
뭔가 많이 부족한 느낌이네요.. 참치하고 연어도 그닥 신선해보이지 않았어요... 배달해서 먹어서 그런가.. 트립어드바이저 평점이 엄청 좋은데.. 저는 점수를 많이 주지는 못하겠습니다.
The food was fresh and amazing. The building is so unique and the staff were so friendly and helpful! I would highly recommend going here !!
Very helpful, friendly staff and great food!!! Poke bowl with fresh food and lots of choice. Recommended!

Came here by recommendation with a couple friends. Was not disappointed! I've been traveling southeast Asia for a while and this was the first chance to try reliable raw salmon in a while (Western stomach). Plenty of options for vegetarians.; Khue and the rest of the staff were really friendly to us and made sure we enjoyed our food!

I haven't visited the restaurant. I used to order poke from Poke Saigon all the time, the price is a bit steep but I don't mind paying more to eat healthier. Lately, I've been very disappointed though. In the last two orders I felt like I was paying 150,000 vnd for a bowl full of rice. One time I ordered half rice half salad, and got half of a bowl of rice, plus some salad and other toppings (certainly didn't look like half-half to me). The other time, I ordered brown rice and got 2/3 of the bowl filled with white rice.
Me gusta mucho la idea del Poke, y en este local lo trabajan muy bien, con productos frescos y de primera calidad, tu eliges la opción que más te guste, no puede fallar.

The poke is very delicious and one can choose as many toppings as one wants:) the girls that work there are very friendly and offered to give us traveling tips as well. You would not regret it ! Very delicious:)

Very welcoming place and great poke bowls for a perfect lunch.; It is difficult to find it (you need to get in the building n 42 and go up to the second floor) but totally worthy it!; The restaurant is very clean and light, staff was very kind and spoke very good English.; Options to make the bowl were good (types of rice - protein - sauces - toppings....). One bowl costs 150,000 VND which is a totally fair price for the quality of the food !!!; Give it a try if you fancy something different.

Excellents bowls, cuisine rafraîchissante. Personnel extrêmement gentil. Le cadre est simple et agréable. Nous recommandons vivement cet endroit si vous souhaitez changer de la cuisine vietnamienne. 350000VND pour deux bowls et deux bouteilles d’eau.

I had amazing poke and a wonderful fresh watermelon juice. The combination options for the poke were very varied and naturally very tasty. I liked that I could have brown rice instead of white. I got very good service from some extremely nice women. The restaurant is a bit hidden, you need to enter a building where a lot of motorbikes are parked. Hit the stairs and on the first floor you get to, you’ll see some nice and quirky shops. Continue ahead and you’ll find Poke Saigon.; Also, the raw food is safe for the “western stomach” ;-)

Kinda difficult to find but the food quality is amazing. Nutritious and delicious. Very fresh ingredients and the staff are really accommodating and speak good english. They're available in Vietnammm too.

Natürlich via TripAdvisor auf das Restaurant aufmerksam geworden. Man muss sich ein wenig überwinden in dieses Gebäude hineinzugehen aber es lohnt sich. Kleiner Tipp: lieber die Treppe nehmen, für den Aufzug wird Geld verlangt....; Aber der Aufstieg in die zweite Etage lohnt sich. Es ist extrem lecker. Die Bedienung hilft einem Schritt für Schritt und nimmt sich viel Zeit wenn man es noch nie probiert hat.; Dass wir am nächsten Tag wiederkommen haben wir schon nach dem ersten Löffel festgelegt

Das Essen ist wirklich nur zu empfehlen! Wir waren vorher noch nie da und die Angestellten waren super lieb und hilfsbereit. Sie haben sich ca. 5min um uns gekümmert damit wir alles hinbekommen. Der Lachs hat super Qualität und alles ist sehr frisch. Ein Poke ist zwar mit 150000 VND für vietnamesische Verhältnisse „relativ“ teuer aber es lohnt sich und man ist danach total satt!; Also geht dahin!!
- delicious and very fresh ingredients; - they do speak English very well; Absolutely recommend that place.

Once we found the place we were very impressed by the layout and the staff! My partner was given the wrong order, and the staff were so friendly and helpful at replacing it! The food was super fresh and delicious! 100% recommend!
The whole family loved it and said can we come back tomorrow. 10/10 for freshness and flavour. This was just the fresh food punch we needed after 8 days in Vietnam.
Good food, good people. Nice spot central in district 1 really good to reach.; Thank you for the many tips we received for our trip.
Đồ ăn ngon, tươi sống, nhân viên thân thiện, luôn tươi cười và tư vấn nhiệt tình với khách hàng. Sẽ quay lại sớm :))))

Das Essen dort war echt super! Man kann sich seine Bowl selbst zusammenstellen. Als Basis kann zwischen Salat, braunem- und weissen Reis gewählt werden. Bei den Doppings ist für jeden etwas dabei! Die Bedienung war außerdem sehr freundlich und hat uns super Tipps für unseren Trip gegeben.
Definitely recommend to visit this place. Everything was so fresh and tasty and the staff is amazingly helpful and nice. Dont miss the chance to taste this incredibly good poke when in Saigon

This place is brilliant if you are vegetarian, vegan, or a seafood lover! Everything is made right in front of you and you get so many choices. Fresh vegetables, fruit and seafood are available along with a selection of delicious toppings and sauces. The ladies who were working here spoke incredible English and were extremely helpful with dietary requirements. The location is slightly tricky so I would suggest taking a google maps app or screen grab to find it! A complete hidden gem and so healthy and tasty!

Small place. Difficult to find but fantastic experience. It's serving only salads, but when you try it you will love it. It's slightly more expensive than standard low cost restaurants, but it's worth it.

Really great spot for high quality food. The service level is very high, especially by Vietnam standards aha. I've been here maybe 5 or 6 times and it never fails to disappoint. The staff's English is great and have been trained well to make everyone feel like an important customer. It's a nice little gem. Hard to find the first time, but after that you'll never forget it.; ; Thank you Thanh for making my last visit extra nice. Keep up the amazing work!
We had lunch here - the staff speak brilliant English and were so helpful and friendly helping us create our poke! End result was delicious, so fresh and flavoursome! Would definitely recommend!
This place is so cute and the girls working here are the sweetest! Very service minded. The food was delicious and the servings will for sure fill you up! So much food.

Visited yesterday for lunch. Lovely! A little bit hard to find, go up the internal stairs from the street, (pretty sure Google navigated me through the bookshop first!) Attentive staff, fresh food, good choice and price. The staff members came over a couple of times to check if I wanted more sauce etc.
Thức ăn tươi, nước sốt ngon và đậm đà, phục vụ nhiệt tình vui vẻ, giá hơi mắc một chút!; Món ăn theo kiểu Hawaii mọi người nên thử!

This abandoned apartment block has been taken over by hip & happening youngsters who can’t afford retail rent but certainly have artistic flair & spunk to boot . The tiny shops were full of unique individually styled jewellery & fashion . On a hot , very hot day I , with my sister & niece in tow , popped into Poke for a refreshing drink but the friendly ladies at the counter were so helpful & willing that we piled our bowls high with fresh veggies & sesame sauce , & devoured it in minutes; totally delicious. The offer of fresh organic juices was a great way to end the meal . And to top it all , they offered us the glass bottles to take with us so we could fill up with water & not have to buy single use plastic bottles. Well done ladies , round of applause for you .

Was thinking what to eat during the business trip to HCMC and found this from internet.; Super good poke bowl and fresh juices.; All ingredients are super fresh and we can choose whatever toppings we like.; Staff are super friendly and giving informative advice the moment I stepped in to the counter.; Will definitely come back again!

We randomly selected the place from Google, and we were so lucky! Absolutely great service! The food was quite a nice breakaway from the traditional vietnamese food that we had been having. The portion and variety of toppings make this a very fulfilling meal.; The place is also located in a nice area and would be convenient to take a look around afterwards.

I consider myself as a foodie but do not use tripadvisor at all. The bowl in here was so tasty that I had to change my mind and write a few words. So far the best poke I had with great young stuff ladies willing to help you and advise in all directions that would satisfy you in 110 percent. Please, come to Czech republic!

Wat een vriendelijk personeel, meteen bij binnenkomst enthousiast ontvangen. Een pokébowl kost 150.000 dong (6€) en je mag 2 soorten vis kiezen, zoveel toppings als je wilt alleen voor sommige moet je een minimaal bedrag bijbetalen.; ; De pokébowl zelf is de moeite waard van een taxirit van 20 minuten. Tijdens het eten komt ze nog even vragen of het lekker is en als we nog iets nodig hebben dat we het gewoon kunnen vragen. Wat een leuke tent, leuk personeel en een echte aanrader!

Great food and nice chill place.; ; To get to the place you walk into a motorcylce parking space then a few flight …

Really nice English speaking staff. She was helpful and helped us picking the ingredients for our first time trying Poke. The ingredients are fresh enough and the proportion is as you can see, huge. We asked for and they happily added more …

It's a cute place hidden in one of Saigon's apartment buildings. Everything is super clean and there are some comfortable seats. I haven't tried their poke but I had a pitaya bowl. It was tasty but I feel like some extra toppings would make it even better. The smoothie part was frozen - basically like a sorbet.
150k for a bowl.; ; Easy to order with a lot of free reign for what your want. Cool quiet lounge-y …

One of the hidden treasures of the city. Once you arrive to the address, you must walk into a tiny motorbike parking garage room towards a grand staircase at the back. Then just walk up a floor & you'll be outside again, you will see signs …

Always amazing poke here! You can make a vegan poke bowl by choosing tofu and sesame-soy dressings with the right toppings. So delicious! It’s 120k vnd for a vegetarian/vegan bowl (150k for a regular bowl).

Amazing place. You make your own poke bowl with a base of rice, salad or both, then add raw fish and lots of other ingredients and sauces. Everything is so fresh and delicious and very reasonably priced. Staff is also very friendly and helpful. If I lived in HCMC I would definitely be a regular here.

Very very nice place, it seams to be hosted in an apartment. The girls are very gentle and patient with us foreigners. The food is excellent and served best. Highly recommended. The place is a little bit hidden and not easy to find and the entrance might discourage, but do not hesitate and reach the first floor...you won't regret it 2 …

Most amazing poke bowl ever! So delicious! And a great variety to chose from. The staff was really friendly, helpful and spoke English perfectly. The restaurant is really cute just a little bit hidden. I will definitely come back!
Fantastic poke bowl with about 20 kinds of toppings and 7 sauce options. Every bowl custom made for you. 45k tete craft beer from  6-8pm too. Left stuffed for 150k dong.
Excellent quality food and good topping variety with a great atmosphere. Highly recommend. …

Món ăn không quá lạ nhưng cách kết hợp thì độc đáo và rất hợp miệng, nhiều lựa chọn về chủng loại rau cá topping. Không gian đẹp và yên tĩnh khá hợp để đi cặp đôi hoặc nhóm bạn nhỏ. Gửi xe dưới lầu 10k/chiếc.
Excellent place! Super delicious food! Don't skip this place while visiting Ho Chi Min
Great little restaurant tucked away on 1st floor accessed via a flight of stairs inside a building. Delicious fresh Poke, friendly staff and a nice chilled atmosphere!

Wow! Such a special spot. It just oozes style and good vibes. Tucked away in a unique location on the 1st floor of a residential building, this beautiful little Poke shop serves a variety of super fresh ingredients with which you can build …
Little hidden gem with absolutely mindblowing food and interior. Loved it. Paid 175.000 for a full bowl and drink.
For sure the best poke in town. While the others are too dry, these ones are perfect. Good service. Nice atmosphere.

6$ fantastic food. Delicious.

The poke bowls are amazing!! It's a little hidden gem, literally hidden on the first floor above a parking garage for motorbikes. Once find your way tjere you will not be disappointed. The ordering process couldn't be easier, it's laid out …
A good bowl of Poke. Delicious, fresh, fully filled bowl. Would go again!
Nice staffs and delicious poke bowl.
Great Hawaiian style poke spot. Head through the alley and up to the first floor.

Very good japanese sushi salad with quite the Poke style as everywhere else. Price is a bit higher compared with local spendings but a good match for expats who would like to get something familiar to foods in Poke elsewhere.
Cozy. Healthy. Affordable for a nice brunch or a meal

This place is great! It's a more modern style poke than the traditional Hawaiian style I grew up eating almosy every day. The selection of fish is always fresh with lots of delicious sauces and toppings to choose from. I had the tuna and …
Really good food. You can choose what to put in your bowl, there are a lot of choices. The place is small and crowded during lunch so you should come early for seats.
I love poke it fresh it delicious and it healthy; - the price is about 7usd can make you want to go once a week but the portion is quite big
Amazing,fresh,friendky and super cool location. Hidden away and I hope to keep this place my personal secret  …
Món ăn ngon, không gian đẹp!!!
Great, friendly service. Fresh and delicious food. Definitely not my first Poke bowl and won't be my last.
150k for as much toppings as you want (and 2 scoops of raw salmon/tuna/tofu, which I found enough), loved it!
Great little gem in the heart of Saigon. They serve healthy salads called Poke and they also have smoothie bowls!!!
Awesome place to get a salad. Staff is super helpful and the portions are big.; Can really recommend!!
So so so yummy and colorful loaded with delicious and healthy toppings! The salmon is tasty.

amazing poke bowl. unbelievable food and great service.
