Choose your favorite ingredients from steps 1 to 5 to complete your own ball. 1 dish/150,000 dong. Drinks other than water are 50,000 dong. The music, the atmosphere of the shop, and the taste are delicious!
Very nice place to have lunch. Very friendly staff who take the time to explain how it works. Good choice for a tasty healthy meal. It's a bit hidden but it's worth looking for.
Create your own poke! So tasty, big bowls and lots of choice. Not the cheapest but worth it! They did run out of tofu when I went which was a shame

We went to the cafe apartment and here we found this little simple poke place, with just the best fish and veggies I’ve had in a long time, we sat there while it was raining and it was so cozy and we loved it, thank you very much
這個餐廳菜品性價比超高的，便宜又好吃。服務員英語都挺不錯的，不用擔心溝通問題。環境也十分不錯，值得一試！

Zooo lekker!! En het personeel is super vriendelijk pokebowl voor €6,- Je mag 2 soorten vis kiezen en aanvullen met 7 verschillende toppings. De meiden kwamen vragen of alles naar wens was en of ze nog meer voor me konden doen. Daarna kreeg ik allerlei tips over koffietentjes etc in de buurt. Absoluut 5 sterren waard!

Ich kann mich meinen „Vorrednern“ nur anschließen - Location versteckt aber es lohnt sich absolut! Wer abends geht, muss einfach nur beim Parkplatz der Rolle einen Stock nach oben laufen und da ist das Restaurant auch schon (ein Blick lohnt sich m.E. Auch in die Räumlichkeiten der Galerie gegenüber!) Wir kommen morgen gleich wieder!

Nicht einfach zu finden. Es befindet sich im 2. Stock eines mehrstöckigen Hauses mit vielen Geschäften drin. Es ist deswegen leider auch nicht sehr groß aber dafür umso leckerer!; Das Personal ist sehr, sehr zuvorkommend.; Schöne, moderne Atmosphäre.; ; Außer verschiedene Fischsorten gibt es auch Tofu
THE FOOD IS INCREDIBLE. And much more filling than i initially thought it would be. Lots of options for what to eat, and they are incredibly tasty. 100% recommend

after many attempts...finally found the shop. entrance is next to the bookshop and you will need to climb 4 flight of steps, turn right and it will be the 1st shop. seats are limited BUT the service and food are fantastic. i am the 1st customer and the only lady there while preparing the food patiently explain to me the detail. She is so sweet and friendly.; food..is awesome...i have the sushi rice with salad plus spicy tuna and shrimp...with lots of other topping..; cannot finish the food as the portion although looks small but is packed with so much taste and flavour. it is a healthy choice and worth trying.

The building looks a little sketchy from the outside but it’s worth venturing one or two floors up to this little restaurant. Fresh ingredients and a lot of food in the standard poke bowl (150,000 dong), served Subway style where you pick what you want in it. Lots of yummy and healthy options

We went here for the first time and were blown away by the taste of our delicious bowls!  The products here are top notch quality, the sauces soooo delicious, also the umami mushrooms and eggplants were AMAZING  Also the staff is nice and friendly! WOW!  We‘ll come again!
Very tasty Poké. Fresh ingredients. The staff is super sweet and caring. Would explain everything to you. Clean restaurant, strange building though ;-) Absolutely worth a visit.

J’ai adoré la nourriture et le personnel était juste parfait ! Ils ont pris le temps de tout nous expliquer et nous ont même offert de la nourriture à la fin! Je le recommande si vous êtes des amateurs de poke ball

Probably one of my favourite places I’ve eaten in Vietnam. Lovely friendly staff who like to chat whilst making your bowl, great knowledge of the foods they are serving you. The food was super tasty and at such a great price too. If I come back to Ho Chi Minh this will be top of the list of places to go back and eat again, I would 100% recommend. Thank you!
Virkelig virkelig god mad, super sødt personale - man føler sig rigtig velkommen.; Kan VARMT anbefale dette sted!

Hands down one of the best poke bowls I’ve had. The staff are extremely helpful and the food is delicious. You are able to add unlimited toppings with only a few having an extra charge.; ; Great value for great quality food!

The girl working there was so sweet and helped us along the process of ordering, as it was our first time. The food was excellent!; I wish there was a place like this back home, I would go there everyday.
Excellent made poke bowl. They are very generous with the amount !!! Lovely staff and lovely scenery! We walked 40 minutes to get here and well worth it!

This place it’s a bit difficult to find. You need to enter through the entrance that has motorbikes in there, and then it’s on the second floor! They staff are lovely and the food is amazing! Spicy salmon was the winner
One of the best meals I’ve had in Vietnam. Simple, delicious, healthy, and all at a reasonable cost. Couldn’t recommend enough.
Super nice poke, reasonably priced, tons of toppings to choose from and great service to top it all off! Definitely recommend! :)

Ho pranzato qui dopo aver letto alcune recensioni online. Il posto è poco visibile dall'esterno perché si trova al primo piano di un palazzo. Abbiamo preso una poke con tofu ed una con salmone ed entrambe hanno superato le nostre aspettative: sono buonissime oltre che belle. In più, le quantità sono più che abbondanti. Estremamente consigliato!

Es befindet sich im berühmten Cafe Apartment Gebäude. Obwohl wir kein Fisch essen, hatten wir keine Mühe uns mit Hilfe der netten Angestellten eine fantastische Poke-Bowl zusammenzustellen! Es gibt Tofu als Fleisch/Fisch Ersatz! Alle Zutaten sind frisch und von bester Qualität. Gerne wieder:)

Het eten is super lekker en je kunt zelf kiezen voor 2 soorten vis en veel groenten etc erover heen. Het is heel lekker en vers en de mensen zijn onwijs vriendelijk! Het is wel eventjes zoeken, wang je moet onder het poortje met de brommers door en dan met de trap naar de tweede verdieping waar het restaurant rechts zit! De entree ziet er niet super uit, maar het restaurant zelf wel! Echt een aanrader

Nous avions uniquement une demi heure pour déjeuner et nous nous sommes régalez ! Le concept est simple et efficace ! Tout est vraiment niquel niveau fraîcheur des produits. Je pense même y retourner ce soir bref foncé et ne vous laisser pas décourager par le fait que le restaurant est à l’étage après de escaliers !

It is the first time I tried a poke bowl and it was amazing. You choose a rice base, a sauce and you get as maybe toppings as you want! The staff was really friendly and helpful, they gave some good recommendations. Side fact I liked the soundtrack ;)
Found this little Poke bowl place and it was fabulous. Delicious food and great location in the Cafe Apartment building. An example of what you find when you are a little adventurous
Had an awesome pokébowl. You could load it up with everything you wanted. The staff is really helpful and the vibe in the restaurant is really relaxed.

Stopped by This cute poke shop inside the coffee mansion. Perfect choice for us in hot summer! You can choose as much topping and seafood as u want with only 150000VND. The taste and sauce definitely won over the price. Plus point* smiley staff :); ; Highly recommended to poke lover and vegetarian as well!
Fresh food, friendly stuff, location is great, it is a hidden location but if you ask someone at the place will tell you where it is. Give a go, you will go again and again.

The food is tasty but there are problems associated with meat/fish contamination. The staff should be trained better on handling vegetarian/vegan requests. Some tips: 1. use a separate bowl and scoop for vegetarians 2. do not touch meat/fish items while serving vegetarian items into the bowl. Just adhering to some basic hygiene factors will make this place a hit. I had to walk out my second time when the seaweed scoop was heavily touching the shrimp already in someone's bowl.

My boyfriend and I absolutely loved our poke bowls. I had tofu and he had octopus, they were so refreshing and filling, a lovely break from street food. The staff were very informative and helped us pick!

I have officially become a poke fan! I loved this place. The funny thing is that you wouldn’t expect to find a place like this walking up 2 floors on a dirty stairway, but this place is a gem. They were very friendly and helpful since we never had eaten poke before. Needless to say that the food was absolutely delicious and tasty!

This is a must visit restaurant if you’re into sushi/sashimi and generally fresh food! Their portions are extremely generous you get so much for 150000 dong. The tuna and salmon were so fresh and fell apart in my mouth  honestly would eat here again everyday if I could.; The actual shop is on the second floor so you will need to look for the sign! But worth it ; Best meal I’ve had in a long time

After having a lot of oily fried food in ho chi Minh, we wanted somewhere cleaner to eat to reset, this was that and more. very very good price £12 for 2 people with full stomachs, huge selection of fresh fish and toppings (as many as you want) as someone who turns their nose up to green food usually, this was incredible in taste and value! It's the SECOND FLOOR cant see it from street so need to go up stairs (elevator is paid)
Amazing food! Everything is fresh and tasty. Can't wait to come back for lunch today. Don't miss out.
The poke bowl here is amazing, so delicious ! And the staff are super nice and helpfull would highly recommend.
Very well-prepared ingredients combine in 1 bowl. The taste is good, the bowl looks small, but it actually makes you feel super full when you nearly finish it. Good to try.
My family and I come here a lot and the food and service is really awesome!! The staff is nice too :)

Fuimos a este restaurante por TripAdvisor, nos atendió una chica muy simpática que nos recomendó y nos explicó muy bien cómo preparar nuestro propio Poke Bowl en un inglés muy claro. Ingredientes frescos y muy ricos y puedes combinar a tu gusto!; Además está en un edificio muy curioso ya que cada balcón de la fachada corresponde a un local con decoración diferente. Totalmente recomendable!!
The service and the quality of the food is good. I’ve been here for now, two days in a row for lunch.
Đồ ăn ngon , nhân viên dễ thương , hòa đồng , phục vụ rất nhiệt tình , quán đẹp , sẽ đến ăn nữa khi có diệp

I had a very good meal which tasted fresh and delicious ! It was quite hard to find because it was hidden in the back of the building but the food was definitely worth it . Not too expensive compared to other places but very filling and healthy . It was quite small so the place can get filled up quickly but I recommend this place should be tried !

I searched for a fun restaurant with great food for my last night in Saigon. What a find Poke was. The food was simple, fresh and tasty! I only write reviews if they’re amazing or terrible. Obviously, Poke was the former. Great food. Friendly and helpful staff. I’m a total foodie, and I’m thinking of stealing their idea and moving it to the States...just kidding. Do not miss this place if you happen to be staying in District 1 in Saigon. They’ve opened up another location close by, but we didn’t get a chance to check it out.

J’adore ce genre d’endroits où l’on doit chercher un peu pour trouver le restaurant.; Les bowls sont très bons, on nous explique tout bien à notre arrivée, tout est très bien fait.; N’hésitez pas trop longtemps!

We were explained the system in perfect English, and we’re surprised it was unlimited veggie toppings! The portions were huge and the lady came and checked if everything was okay with our food and if she could get us anything else. Amazing service, unreal food! Pricier than we’d usually pay as backpackers but SO worth it!
De service bij Poké Saigon is erg goed, ook spreken de medewerkers goed Engels op de dag dat ik er ben. Goed gevulde bowl en het smaakte heerlijk. 10/10 would recommend
Heerlijk, goede kwaliteit en vriendelijk geprijsd. Daarbij spreken ze goed Engels en zijn ze klantgericht. 10/10 would recommend

My sister and I went here on our first night in HCM. The poke was insane, we could have as many toppings as we liked and filled us up perfectly. The staff were super nice and kind. We will definitely be returning.
Food was beyond yummy!; Ladies were so lovely; Would 100% recommend as a must if you love healthy food!; Great price too as my bowl was so stacked of all sorts of sides and cost me 150,000 (about £5)

I visited here when I was looking for a simple meal. When I arrived the staff were extremely friendly explaining the process of selections and the options I had. I explained I wanted something a little spicy and tasty. There recommendations resulted in a great meal; I would come back to this place again.

Real find, fresh food to order in novel way. We were a bit “fried fooded out” found this place on trip advisor. Bit hard to find but well worth it. Pick out all your ingredients from black board and food is presented in a bowl. Fresh and delicious.

This hidden gem in the cafe apartment truly lived up to its name. I’ve tried a number of poke bowls and, so far, this is the tastiest one I’ve eaten. If you’re confused about designing your bowl for the first time, the staff will gladly walk you through it! ~

So impressed with friendly staffs and food quality. They’re so helpful and nicely guided me how to make my own bowl. Ingredients were tasty and fresh also. And of course, it’s huge so I could not finish the bowl haha.

Went to this small restaurant with my Vietnamese partner for supper and we both loved it. It is a little hard to find (up an alley, then a few flights of stairs), but worth it when you get there. The board behind the servers is in English and the staff help you through the simple choice options as you select your food. Tasty food, great value and friendly staff.....a must if you are in HCMC for a few days

I went to PokeSaigon for lunch and really enjoyed my stay there. The combination of salad, rice and all the different flavors is worth the money (150k VND). The staff is super friendly and helpful :-)

A bit difficult to find but I asked a few people so in the end no problem. The 2 girls running the Business today were super friendly and helpful with some guy don’t no nothing :) the food was very delicious. Fresh and looked nice ! Highly recommended !

The girls were very kind and gave us tips on what to do in the city and where to eat out. The restaurant is small, cozy and stylish and the food was really delicious - we definitely recommend to come here.
My friend and I visited Poke Saigon at Ly Tu Trong street in a rainy day. Luckily we were served quickly and we had a tasteful meal with two big bows. 5 star for Poke Saigon's service and taste
Loved the place! The food was great, and the staff were very helpful. The price was worth the meal, and the whole ambience just worked well with the food. I will definitely come back again.

De medewerkers leggen duidelijk het concept uit waarnaar je vervolgens je eigen bowl kunt samenstellen. Je hebt veel keuze en alles is vers. Daarnaast krijg je ook een een flinke bowl. Krijg je het niet op vraag je gewoon om een plastic bakje. Zijn je side dishes op, kun je ze ook nogeens aanvullen.
Après 15jrs de street food, ça nous a fait beaucoup de bien de manger un poke. Pleins de toppings super travaillé. Mon truc préféré les petits œufs de caille « fermenté » au soja. Délicieux.

ở đây thức ăn vẫn giữ được độ tươi ngon và khi chúng được kết hợp với sốt thì tuyết vời ! Đặc biệt là thích hợp với người ăn diet hay là người muốn trải nghiệm loại món ăn khác biệt với bữa ăn hằng ngày
The vibe in the restaurant is so chilled and the food is great! Love the concept and it’s such good value for money

The poke was very delicious. Me and my friend were served very quickly. Every servers have big smiles. They’re very kind and helpful. I’ll return and invite some friends to try the poke in your restaurant
This guys know what they are doing, I was not very familiar with this kind of food but everything went great, super
I had an interesting experience trying this kind of food. Rice, salmon, mango, beans etc. But it turned out so good!

Het is even zoeken, maar dan wordt je niet teleurgesteld! Het is een leuk restaurantje in een lelijk gebouw. Alle ingrediënten van de pokebowl zijn van hoge kwaliteit en erg lekker! Dit is een aanrader! Het personeel spreekt perfect Engels en zijn erg behulpzaam.
I ordered tuna and spicy tuna with spicy mayo. You can add as many toppings as you want at the end (like seaweed, sesame, mushroom, crab salad). Good and friendly service. Strongly recommended!!

Wir hatten schon einmal eine Pokebowl in Deutschland aber mal abgesehen von dem viel günstigerem Preis, ist es auch meeega lecker gewesen! Super freundliches Personal, das alles noch einmal erklärt haben, das nachgefragt hat ob es geschmeckt hat und die noch Tipps für Ho-Chi-Minh City gegeben haben. Einfach nur top
Heerlijke plek, verrukkelijk eten, hele vriendelijke mensen! De volgende dag weer terug gegaan! Wat we niet op kregen, kregen we mee met extra topping! Top!!!

We only had on delivery, each time it was very good and fresh but the tuna and the octopus are sliced too tiny.; As we had ordered 4 times a week, the nice staff contacted me to thank. The last time i was a bit disappointed with the delivery guy (not the same as usual) who was very late and wasted my time by counting 3 times the money claiming it missed 100k! When he eventually agreed it was all there + tips, he wasn't happy anyway! Very displeasing guy, I way prefer our usual delivery guy, smiling and nice. Regardless, it remains one of the best poke in Saigon, highly recommended

Les deux employés étaient très polies et serviables, elles ont pris le temps de bien m'expliquer le menu puisque c'est ma première fois. Le plat est frais et tout beau, et surtout, le rapport qualité-prix est au top. Ma première fois et certainement pas la dernière ;)

Un personnel attentif et gentil, des plats copieux, une bière locale très bonne. Le tarif peux paraître un peu élevé pour la ville mais la qualité et le goût est là avec le personnel adéquat.; Bref un endroit à tester!

Cute place in the second floor of a building right in the center of the city. The girls behind the counter were very attentive from the minute I arrived. They explain how everything works in perfect english and even let you refill the toppings on your bowl once you have already payed. Overall it was a very nice experience and would return without a doubt if I ever find myself in Saigon again.
Erg lekker gegeten! Powebowl kan je naar keuze samenstellen. Was erg lekker. Restaurantje ziet er ook erg gezellig uit van binnen.

여기 점원은 너무나 불친절했습니다. 손님이 많아서 바빠서 그런지 퉁명스럽게 “그거 없어요. 안돼요. 또 뭐할건데요?” 심지어 자기가 못알아듣는 영어는 무시하고 그냥 들이붓습니다. 포케의 장점은 베이스부터 토핑까지 원하는 재료를 골라 먹을 수 있다는 건데... 선택하려고 하면 짜증스럽게 반응하더라구요. 그러고서는 나중에 뭐 필요한거 있으면 더 주겠다고 하는데 다시는 오고싶지도 않고 남들 추천해주고 싶지도 않습니다. 양도 양이지만 더 화가난 건 재료의 질도 별로였어요. 구체적으로 상호를 말하긴 그렇지만 만 동 추가해서 다른 곳에 신선한 포케 포함된 뷔페드세요. 그게 훨 나을거 같아요.

I ordered my first ever pokebowl a few weeks back and I was not disappointed so I have ordered several times since. The food is tasty, fresh and normally always delivered before the expected delivery time. The build your own option for the pokebowl is great too!
You will not be disappointed, what a delicious lunch. Highly recommend for a tasty bowl of goodness. We enjoyed our lunch and would return.

Highly recommend! A friend and I stumbled upon this place while exploring District 1. We had both been eating strictly Vietnamese food for weeks and having this was like a little throwback to western culture. It was delicious and worth the western prices. I think after currency exchange it works out as being £5 per bowl which is still half the price you would pay anywhere in London. 10/10 and would love to go again.

This was my first experience with Poke and it was great! It's essentially Subway but healthier and more delicious. I came because it said they had gluten free options on TripAdvisor - although the menu board doesn't say this explicitly, it's easy to see what's going into your food and there is no cross contamination. A bowl costs 150k and is very filling - you can add as much or as little as you like! The staff were all very friendly and spoke good English. I will definitely be back.

When i look at it, was wondering whether its good. Went to the location and couldnt find. Decided to take the staircases and i found a gem. Very nice food and clean environment. Like the food and music. Totally changed my bad mood into good mode.

The food and ambience here is perfect, cozy and delicious. If you’re a salmon sashimi lover, it’s a must try with sushi rice and guacamole. The staffs are super friendly and helpful, recommended us must visit places and rooftop bars.; ; Thank you! Will visit again.

Vanavond met z'n 4en bij Poke Saigon gegeten. Verassende en leuke locatie. Heerlijk gegeten. Je mag zelf je eigen Poke Bowl samenstellen. Leuke en supervriendelijke en vrolijke meiden in de bediening die goed engels spreken. Absolute aanrader.
We visited "Poke Saigon" a couple of days ago and it was really nice! It offers a cool location aswell as very tasty food!; Would definitely recommend it!

I had read amazing reviews of poke and decided I would try out during my few fats in Saigon. Unfortunately, on my first night,; I couldn’t find it. This is because I have no sense of direction and didn’t appreciate the fact that it wasn’t staring at me from the Main road, but that I had to spot the sign and go up some stairs! I didn’t let my lack of finding it put me off. I messaged poke on Facebook and wasn’t sent clear directions, a map etc and the next night, I found it and am so glad we did. I was with my 14 year old son who loves creating his own concoctions of food. We both really enjoyed putting our bowls together. So much that we came back the following day!; The food is reasonably priced and of a very high standard.; I’m so glad we persevered to find poke!; Please make sure you go, you won’t regret it!

Went here for lunch today and this was my first experience of a Poke bowl! The ladies that served us were really helpful and patient in explaining how it worked (ie which toppings, sauces you could order). Great food, lovely staff and a nice setting made it an excellent experience. Would definitely recommend.

Visited last night with family of 5, based on reviews, and we were delighted with everything. Food was fresh and fragrant, two lovely and very helpful staff, air conditioned and simple but super clean environment. Took a bit of finding as not advertised from the street and up on the 2nd floor of what looks a bit of a chaotic assembly of restaurants and shops, but WELL worth it.; Great value for money at less than £40 for all 5 of us. Fast food with a difference, wholesome and fresh. The only pressure on us to leave was generated by all the people coming in. My advice....if in HCMC give it a go, it’s fab.

The topping here is very fresh and delicious; I always visit here to energize my afternoon activities; The space is very gentle and very warm; The staff are enthusiastic and friendly; So , this is my favorite place
The food here is delicious and fresh.; restaurant is very clean.; Friendly staff and speak good English.
It was the first time i tried that food and it was delicious. The service really friendly, if we would wanted more we could get it for free. They also gave is tipps what we can do in hcmc.

While searching places to eat in Ho Chi Minh, this place consistently popped up as one of the top restaurants. So we had to go, and I’m so glad we did. We arrived and it was packed, with no open seats, which is always a good sign. Lucky for us the turnaround time was pretty quick so we were able to find seating after ordering. The food was well worth the trip, beautiful presentation everything was so fresh and it tasted outstanding. If you are a poke lover, you have to visit here.
スタッフさんが優しかったんでサラダもめっちゃ美味しかったです。材料も新鮮だと感じていた。ダイエット中の人におすすめします。; 毎日食べたいと思っています(笑笑); Nhân viên rất thân thiện, nguyên liệu rất tươi và vị cũng rất ngon và tốt cho sức khỏe.
Great place.; !!!Amazing stuff and awesome food; Had a lovely vegeterian bowl, they .let you choose all the ingredients; .Highly reccomended

Super friendly staff, helped a lot during the bowl assembly. More lovely than the staff, was the food, with endless possibilities and vegeterian options. Everything is so fresh.; ; Highly recommended!

Super friendly staff that gladly gave us recommendations for our stay in Saigon. The poke bowls were really nice and big. A lot of different options. Fresh ingredients. Perfect for vegans/vegetarians. Will surely come back!

We were recommended Poke Saigon by friends, it was a bit tricky to find - tucked away behind a shop and up some stairs but the place was busy when we arrived! The food was incredible with the freshest ingredients (would really recommend the spicy salmon and quails eggs). My partner and I shared a bowl of half salad/half rice and still felt full after! The juice was also super tasty and we left feeling healthy and refreshed.
Fresh salad with multiple topping (meat and veg). Can choose organic brown rice or rice.; Absolutely suitable for eat clean or jusst refresh taste
הגענו לסניף בסייגון אחרי חוויה נהדרת בסניף בהאנוי, וגם כאן לא התאכזבנו. חומרי הגלם טריים, ההגשה אסתטית וכמובן הטעם מעולה.
Das Essen ist super lecker und der Service ist ausgezeichnet. Nur mit großem Hunger sollte man nicht her kommen.
Mình biết đến quán do giới thiệu của bạn bè, ấn tượng đầu là quán ăn healthy nhưng đồ ăn khá hấp dẫn, vị thì khá ổn. Nhân viên phục vụ tốt, tận tình

Mình biết quán qua lời giới thiệu của bạn bè và đã rất thích sau lần đầu đi thử. Mình gọi 2 tô, ngon lắm nha !! Mọi người thử đi !! Quán nhỏ nhỏ xinh xinh, nhạc hay, nhân viên thân thiện, wifi rất mạnh nữa
雖然今天等店家準備食物等一陣子; 不過店家馬上展現誠意送給我們果汁喝; 重點是食物清爽健康好吃; 推薦一下！

Deze hotspot zit een beetje verstopt, maar als je hem éénmaal gevonden hebt, staat je een leuke verassing te wachten. Een klein, hip restaurantje met de lekkerste pokébowl. Zeker een aanrader!!; Op de foto de ingang, achterin trap op naar de 2e verdieping!

Für ca 5€ bekommt man hier eine wirklich gute Portion mit sehr vielen Variationsmögmichkeiten. Auch für Vegetarier gibt es hier viel zur Auswahl :); Wir konnten sogar umsonst Naschlag holen! Gutes leckeres Essen

Even zoeken, trap op aan de rechterkant. Van buiten een oud gebouw met verschillende restaurantjes. Kleinschalig, maar heerlijk. Je eigen pokebowl samenstellen, toppings zoveel je wilt. Schattige dames helpen je in prima Engels op weg, aanrader!
Die Bowls sind wirklich himmlisch! Sehr nette Mitarbeiter die einen helfen sich für eine Poke Bowl zu entscheiden! . Wir kommen definitiv wieder! Sehr zu empfehlen!!!
店家两位女生很可爱，热情，东西好吃，价格150，000越南盾，接近50元人民币。只能付现金，囧的是，现金不够，小姐姐还让我先吃，吃完下楼换汇再付款

Un sitio muy chulo, pequeño pero bien arreglado y en el centro de la ciudad. El poke esta riquisimo y es buena opcion si estas cansado de los sabores locales que utilizan mucha salsa o picante. El precio muy bueno tambien, habia estado en el Poke Hanoi tambien, y nos gusto tanto que repetimos aqui para ir a lo seguro.
My friend and I were exploring the building till we were hungry. Staff was very helpful & friendly + food was very delicious!! I would come again when I’ll have the opportunity
Good food, one of the best pokes I ever eat super recommend. The staff is super nice and the concept of the place is beautiful
I came, I saw, I conquered. 1) ate poke 2) got a club recommendation 3) profit.; ; Poke wasn’t bad, was very Californian.
Fresh ingredients and helpful service !!! Waitress gave noticed we were visitors and gave us night life recommendations :)
Food is awesome and staff Nghi is so friendly. Do pay a visit when u come to Ho Chi Minh City. It’s a must try place.
This place is amazing! Super fresh, tons of options, very reasonable, delicious and amazing service!
Our favorite food on our trip. It tastes so fresh, you are permitted to have as many toppings as you want and go get more while you eat through your dish. We highly recommend!
Food was fresh, delicious and healthy. Nghi was super nice, gave us a lot of tips of the city. Highly recommend this place

A hidden gem at district one in Ho chi Minh. Worth to visit. A huge bowl with salad, rice, fishes and a huge variety of toppings. They refilled our bowl with and extra portion of rice, salad and toppings.; ; You must walk through the parking garage for motorbikes, up to the first floor. Clean and bright environment. Friendly staff with good English. Worth to visit and hang out.

Incredible poke bowls! And fantastic service!; ; Highly recommend visiting here. It can be quite hard to find but well worth the effort. Look for the sign for number 42 on the street and then climb two flights of stairs at the back of the building.; ; We were welcomed by an incredibly friendly staff member and she showed us how to order and what some good recommendations are. Just wish we hadn't found it on our last day in Saigon otherwise we would have visited again! It cost $22NZD for two bowls and two soft drinks.
Fresh products, nice staff, good recommandations for the Cafe Apartment. The decor is pretty, there is AC and a terasse. On the second floor !
The fish and vegetables are fresh, and the dish and jouices aee delicious! The staff is super nice and know which combinations to reccomend. Highly recommended!
I’ve been to Poke Hanoi and wanted to try Poke Saigon as well. It’s was the same. The service and food were excellent. It’s a great light meal for lunch or dinner while traveling. I will be back!!

Me and my friend really enjoyed this place! Kinda hard to find, you have to go into an alley (search for the address and go in that alley) and then up 2 stairs and to the right. But it is so worth it! The place is cozy with AC, the staff is really friendly and they speak good english. I am a vegan and my friend a lacto/ovo vegetarian and they had knowledge and helped us get a great bowl that we picked out. They have loads of good toppings (both vegan and non vegan) and it tasted awesome. We also got great sightseeing tips as a bonus :) Highly recommend this place! Had a good beer here as well.
Had a wonderful experience in here! The food was tasty, fresh and beautiful.; The staff was really polite, helpful and nice. Thank you!
Very nice little place.. a bit hard to find but worth it! Ingredients are fresh and very tasty. Staff very friendly and helpful. Go for the wasabi-mayo! It’s awsome!
Everything absolutelly perfect! The staff speak really good English! So what a big surprise in Saigon. Very satisfied with everything! I will go again early.

Little difficult to find but worth the interesting entrance to find this gem. Hadn’t realised it’s all raw fish though; I’m here so went for it. Delicious. Staff really helpful and attentive. Great wee place.

Located in the quickly cafe apartment building, Poke Saigon is a cute little modern clean cafe. Food is so fresh, healthy and delicious. Very reasonably priced for what you get. Unlimited choice of fillings. Really helpful staff! Absolutely on my list to return! Best poke I have ever had!

I was there yesterday, pretty cool lille restaurant with nice staffs. They did not accept credit card but the lady was so kind. I enjoyed my meal and came back with the cash later.; Food was very good, best Poke I have tried I could say.

Greeted with friendly smiles(and very well spoken English). Food was very fresh and put together almost like art work and a taste to match. Highly recommend. About 400’000VTD for 2 bowl and 2 fresh juices.

We arrived here thru TripAdvisor, place serve fresh bowels of any of your choice of thing you find in sushi, so basically breakdown sushi bowel. Very delicious and healthy. Prices are fair, bowel cost around 7$.

You will not find food like this anywhere,it was amazing. The green salad and salmon was fresh and tasted absolutely beautiful. Great atmosphere and the nicest friendliest staff you will ever meet !; Give this one a go,you won’t be disappointed
Great little poke shop, build your own bowl. Not the easiest to find without a sign on the building, but worth tracking down.
We enjoyed the food and the service! Lots of ingredients and a nice combination of flavours make for a great dish!

I didn't go there. We order delivery, so I can't comment about the ambience or decor of the place. But to what we experienced the service was very slow, meal potion was small, a lot of rices and beans which means high calories and the food is very very spicy

A hidden place serves the best poke in town. I'm so glad that we found this place. The food is really fresh and tasty, we enjoyed it very much. The staffs are so friendly and helpful. We will definitely come back soon.
I really enjoy the food there, I enjoyed so much that I return there 3 times.; The wraps and saladas are fresh and taste amazing.
Great food! Very nice staff.; A lot of different options.; Pretty place and fun to seat and rest.; Many shops at the building you can visit.

Went to Poke Saigon, having seen a similar one in London (which I never made it to!). It did not disappoint. The food was amazing- really fresh and lots of options for toppings. A special mention to Nghi also- really friendly, lovely to talk to and gave us some great recommendations! Thank you Poke Saigon!

Stumbled across this as part of the ‘Cafe apartment’ (worth visiting in its own right!). The girls who run it are great, really friendly and keen to chat. They were really helpful at talking us through how to build your own bowl (essentially a base of rice or salad with multiple fresh toppings of fish, pickled vegetables, tofu, etc etc). Food was delicious with a really varied set of ingredients. Would highly recommend!
We've been there twice and every time we enjoyed the food and hospitality. Recommended for vegans and seafood lovers.
Lekkere bowl met tofu kun je daar bestellen! Maar ze hebben vanalles, gevarieerd toppings!; Het ligt wat verstopt maar het is de moeite waard.; Aardige personeel!!
Wir waren über den Mittag im Poke. Es ist nicht einfach das Poke zu finden ABER es lohnt sich! Super feines Essen und sehr freundliche Bedienung !
La comida fue excelente y muy bien de precio, el sitio no es muy bueno para llegar porque no es en una segunda planta pero una vez lo encuentras el sitio está muy bien decorado

Es un sitio escondido, para poder acceder tienes que subir por un garaje de motos, pero merece la pena, un sitio pequeño y acogedor, con comida buena, saludable y productos de buena calidad y sabrosos, un edén en mitad de un país de noodles fritos. Se agradece. Muy recomendable.
Comida sana ,saludable y de buena calidad ubicación algo escondido ,hay que subir al primer piso de un edificio pero fácil de acceder

I see why the line was out the door... the food was fresh and the atmosphere was lively. I had half rice and half green salad with salmon, tuna and avocado on top! Highly recommend id you are vegan or vegetarian or pescatarian!
Fresh and delicious! Good for a change if you are tired of Pho you can get this delicious Poke instead :)
Leckeres und gesundes Fast Food (wenn man die richtige Sauce wählt). Sehr netter Service mit Tips für Ho Chi Minh City ohne was verkaufen zu wollen bekommen
חווית אכילה מיוחדת בהרכבה אישית.; מבחר ענק מגוון וטרי.; מנות גדולות ומפנקות (מנה אחת שהשביעה 2 בחורות ); שווה ביקור אם נתקעתם בסייגון האפורה..

The Pokebowl was very delicious. There was many choise and very lovely staff. The restaurant is very clean with a fresh style. It's funny to walk to the restaurant because it's on the 1st floor. Nice experience!!!!
אכלנו בהאנוי ועכשיו גם בסניף הזה, קונספט מושלם!; רעיון פשוט וקליל, הכל טרי וטעים, הרכבה עצמית מחומרי גלם מקומיים.; מוכן לאכול במקום כזה כל יום!

Sehr gute Bowls. Man kann sich die Zutaten sebst zusammenstellen und wird bei Bedarf sehr nett beraten. Es ist etwas versteckt, man muss in den zweiten Stock gehen. Das Treppenhaus ist etwas weiter hinten beim Eingang 42 einfach rein gehen und nicht von Treppenhaus abschrecken.

Supergott, supertrevlig personal.; 150pesos för en bowl och du får i stort sett allt du kan tänka dig att du vill ha.; ; Lite svårt att hitta, men bara gå igenom porten och uppför trappan. Det är värt det, rekommenderar starkt.
The bowls are really good and to recommend. There is a good selection on toppings and sauces. The staff is super friendly and welcoming. The place is cool. Definetely worth it.
Absolutely amazing food; Staff was super friendly and recommended places to visit with out me even asking 10/10

Poke Saigon was incredible!! The food and service were both impecable. Fish was fresh and numerous toppings available at no additional charge. They also had fresh cold pressed juice. Trang was super friendly and told us about fun places to visit while here. They also have free WiFi. A most go!
Very fresh and tasty. The staff was just all around amazing and very helpful! I took almost all the toppings and every single one was super!
nice place for couple, right in town, super good service, Will be back again With my family and friend
Amazing poke bowls!!; ; The staff is very friendly, the environment is amazing and it is right on the center of the city, perfect lunch before you start exploring the caffes.
Maybe it's just me but I find it a bit pricey :), totally no offence, just my opinion. Food is okay and fresh though. Also healthy
Nice poke bowl restaurant! Lots of options with tuna octopus an salmon. Nice and helpful staff. Interesting location

Cute little hidden gem. Find it and you won't be disappointed. Service is quick. You get to choose your own fresh healthy delicious ingredients to create your own poke. The girls dish up generous bowls of nutritious goodness for you
Great vietnamese restaurant.Food is excellent and super fresh. Staff are friendly and professional.; Highly recommanded.
I came with family after read many reviews and definitely I can say it's even better...really delicious! For sure, we will repeat in our next trip to Ho Chi Minh City.
We enjoyed so much, still good as before. The ingredients were fresh, there was broccoli for new toppings and we love it. The service also great, we will definitely come back.
2nd floor, great smiles, very fresh, lots of choices, really good find. I got take away and ate outside.
really nice staff and the poke bowl was freshly made and tasted great! highly recommend this place, I will visit again for sure!
入口不太好找，從照片中的地方進入（像是寄車的地方）。店員是兩位女生，英文溝通沒有問題，店內的黑板上也有用英文說明點餐的方式！食物很美味，店員人也很好，也介紹了一些越南美食給我，非常推薦！
It's a nice place but quite small so it had better you order food for to go. The food is very clean and fresh. Highly recommend for those who love healthy food!!

Awesome poke bowl train. You go up and choose your base and work along. It is a very good price with very high ingredients. There is tofu available for vegetarians. Not a whole of sitting space during peak lunch hours.

Wij waren in Hanoi ook al bij Poke Hanoi geweest. Daar waren we al fan van en toen bleek dat Poke Saigon hetzelfde is, zijn we uiteraard hier ook gaan eten. Nou niet teleurgesteld hoor. Even lekker en zeer vriendelijk personeel. De meiden die ons hielpen waren vriendelijk, spraken goed Engels en werkten netjes en snel.; ; Een aanrader voor als je een lekkere pokebowl wil!
Auf jeden Fall ein Besuch wert. Freundliches Personal und stylische Einrichtung.; Wer nach einer Geschäftsidee sucht - so ein Laden läuft in jeder Großstadt der Welt
Goed verstopt op de tweede verdieping achterin een steegje op nummer 42. Heel lekker gegeten. De vis was erg vers en alles heel mooi verzorgd. Ook heel vriendelijke uitbaters.

Espectacular producto, forma de preparación y sabor. No aceptan reservas, está un poco recóndito, puesto que está anunciado en la calle pero no se indica cuál es el acceso. Hay que atravesar literalmente el taller de motos y subir al primer piso. Las chicas son super amables, tienen en el mostrador los diferentes ingredientes para hacerlo al gusto, aunque también tienen una pizarra con recomendaciones y precios.; La elaboración es superlimpia y cuidada, la presentación perfecta y el sabor buenísimo. Nosotros cenamos dentro pero tiene mesa fuera ( no es una terraza como tal ), de precio 7€ más o menos por cabeza de media; Es un must!

Wir würden jedem empfehlen dort essen zu gehen. Für 300.000 Dong haben wir zwei große Portionen bekommen. Wir durften wählen aus Reis und Salat, zwei Fischarten, Sauce und so viele Toppings wie wir wollten.; Dazu waren die netten Bedingungen mega freundlich und hilfsbereit. Sie haben sehr geduldig ihr Konzept erklärt und uns beraten, was die Schärfe der Saucen angeht.; Vielen Dank.
Pranzo ottimo veloce e leggero; Situato al secondo piano di un palazzo, il poke Saigon è uno spazio piccolo ma ben curato che offre un pranzo sano e veloce
כשרוצים משהו בריא וקליל, זה המקום המושלם לבוא אליו. מבחר ממש כיפי של תוספות, ריפיל טופו חינם (!) וצוות נחמד ממש. מומלץ בחום :)
Pyszne, zdrowe, kolorowe. Duży wybór dodatków. Przemiła odsługa. Umiarkowane ceny. Ładny wystrój wnętrza lokalu
Không gian dễ thương và nv tư vấn rất nhiệt tình ,đồ ăn ngon ,đảm bảo chất lượng, lần sau sẽ quay lại ủng hộ.

サブウエイのように、５ステップで、サラダにするか米にするか、シーフードは何にするか、他の野菜、トッピングと選ぶシステムだけど、日本のファミレスのサラダバーの方がアイテム数、鮮度含めて数倍まし。この店のオリジナルはマリネっぽい鮮度不明のキハダと、筋の多いアトランだが、それを美味いだ安定の味だと評価する理由が良く解らないのだが、この薄汚いロケーションと極端に少ない席数、メニュー構成、どれをとっても上位に位置する意味が解らない。あくまで「ごく普通だが、値段だけべらぼうに高い」というのが正当な評価と思われる。がっかりである。
近くに両替所があるので、その時にセットで定期的に食べにいきます。安定の味です、ハーフサラダandブラウンライスがオススメ！

Se vuoi mangiare qualcosa di diverso dalla cucina vietnamita, questo è il posto perfetto. il piccolo locale è situato al secondo piano di un palazzo. Al banco scegli gli ingredienti che preferisci per comporre il tuo piatto, che sarà in ogni caso buono e fresco!

Restauracja znajduje się w bardzo niepozornym miejscu ale zdecydowanie warto ją odwiedzić! Jedzenie jest świeże, kolorowe i zdrowe, dziewczyny zapewniają miłą obsługę i mówią po angielsku (duży plus), zdecydowanie polecam :)
Ngon, bổ và phục vụ thân thiện. Thích nhất Hải sản ăn kèm với sốt wasabi, thêm nước ép dưa hấu luôn làm mình hài lòng
Le personnel est réactif, les ingrédients sont frais et la quantité suffisante ! C'est healthy, plein de saveurs, goutu : que de bonheur pour les papilles. L'endroit est chouette, moderne et propre.
Hier bekommt man den Klassiker Hawaii und das sehr lecker und frisch zubereitet. Wir kommen wieder :-)
Great food and great service!; Amazing place in the busiest street in Saigon, beautiful design and great service
Wonderful food and great service.; Healthy, light and kind of cheap; We like it very much and would recommend
God Poké Bowl med det mesta man kan önska. Extremt svårt att hitta, ligger gömt i en trappuppgång, men med tips ifrån flera andra så gick det bra.

Was tricky to find as you have to walk past a motorbike parking lot and head upwards to the 2nd level.; ; But once you get there, you will be rewarded with a good meal of Poke bowl. Staff speaks English perfectly well and it was nice to have an introduction before we started picking our choices. The decor is also great and they have comfortable seats.; ; For 150K dong, it was a little steep but considering the generosity of the food selections and freshness of the ingredients, I would say it is value for money. We went with a half salad and half sushi base and picked two Poke selections. Rest of the toppings and sauce are literally up to you to choose on an unlimited basis. It was our first time trying Poke bowl and we absolutely like the concept and the freshness of the ingredients!
Very good fresh poke like in Hawaii. Also the cold pressed juice in very very nice and the staff is super friendly and nice. Best choice for a quick stop!

Au départ on a hésité de rentré dans l'immeuble.. Mais en fait c'est au 2nd floor.. C'est un lieu fort sympathique. Nous avons pris des pokes, il faut choisir la base (riz ou salade) puis le poisson et les légumes.. C'est frais et c'est très bon. Les serveuses sont très gentilles !; Je recommande.. On a payé 150K en moyenne par personne. C'est un bon rapport qualité/prix.
We tried this location after visiting the one in Hanoi, the food was fresh and very good. Excellent spicy Tuna Poke!

Situer au deuxième étage d’une entrée un peu sombre ce restaurant est un réel bol d’air. Avec ses bowl colorée et délicieux son ambiance agréable et les serveuse tellement souriante. Le poisson est frais et le goût est présent, plat copieux et tarifs correcte. Une adresse à tester.

Luckily I found the place quickly because of the pictures of other reviewers here.; Food was great, affordable and service very quick.; I would recommend though to always check wether someone wants to drink something. They didn’t with me, which is a pity.
Popular space with poke bowl. Casual and fresh. Professional staffs receiving order in good way to make your bowl more delicious.; Price is reasonable and good for one light meal.

Detta stället har otroligt god mat. Man blev mätt och maten smakade utsökt. Personalen på stället var väldigt trevliga och en kvinna som jobbade där gav flera bra ställen att besöka i Ho chi minh city.
Amazing sweet and kind staff, they are so friendly and you feel very welcome straight away! The food was just excellent, I had never had such a good poke Bowl before. So thank you very much

Cute clean and cool! My first meal; When I came to Saigon. Was a little tricky to find, you have to go through the driveway/alley next to the big book shop. I used the stairs, it's the second floor but you need to go a little further up than you think the second floor is. The meal was so fresh and delicious in a very simple way. The staff were delightful and were so interested in what I was getting up to and recommended a great coffee shop the next floor up. The food it self was probably a little on the higher price for Vietnam but well worth it.

This is an amazing place ; ; You can mix your own bowl  and select as many toppings as possible . The staff is absolutely nice and extremely helpful ; ; Got it recommended by a friend and will recommend to everyone, who is in town

Excellent selection of toppings, good rice, good fish and fantastic sauces.; Friendly and helpful staff!; We wanted to know where we should go next in Vietnam to travel and not only did they make suggestions, they wrote it down with the address to book the travelling and the price it should be!; Love it!

Great poke with tons of topping options. The ladies working were super friendly, and they do not skimp on the toppings, and even came around to check in on us and offer extra rice and sauces if we wanted. Our bowls were big enough, and we wanted to save room for dessert at one of the other fun places in the Cafe Apartments, but what a nice offer. Two thumbs up!

This small joint is located on a second floor of a quite dodgy hallway leading to the stairs. Don't use the elevator, unless you want to pay for it. Poke's had very friendly service and they also spoke English well. Their portions are big and all of the ingredients are high quality. Try the brown rice with octupus and tuna topped by mangos!

This place freakin rocks. Kinda confusing to find, but the staff are so kind and helpful. After our second visit in 2 days, they were so sweet and recognized us immediately! They asked about our life/travels and told us about the history of the restaurant (started by a Hawaiian man, so it’s mega authentic). Worth every penny and left me feeling reenergized and fresh.
Hyvät, fressit ja maukkaat annokset. Neljä aikuista söi 28€:lla mahat täyteen. Ystävällinen palvelu! Suosittelen ehdottomasti! Hieman hankala löytää mutta aivan keskeisellä paikalla.

Best food we've eaten in the three weeks we've been in SE Asia - simply fantastic. The tuna and salmon pieces were the most tender either of us had ever had. And the staff were helpful and attentive but otherwise left you in peace. The only downside was finding the place. You enter from street level through what looks like a scooter parking lot and then head upstairs. Don't give up!
Em um ambiente charmoso e bem organizado, funciona esse restaurante que serve pokes deliciosos. O preço é bem atrativo, e o cliente monta o seu prato, escolhendo as proteinas e os acompanhamentos

The poke bowl that I had here was the best poke bowl I’ve ever had. The staff is super nice there as well!! Can’t nothing but recommend. Totally worth your money, the prize is not too bad either  only 150 dong for a bowl
Their Poke salads are an absolute delight to eat. Tried this restaurant in an impulse while browsing the famous cafe apartment in Saigon. Must try if you are in city.
Extremely dissapointing. Fundamental menu items are out of stock. I visited the place two days in a row, and couldnt order any of the suggested bowls, because major ingredients were out of stock.

So nice and cozy enviroment, food was oh so good and the personnel really friendly and helpful. I barely ever write a review but I loved this place so much that I want everybody else to experience this as well.

Came here for a spot of lunch after reading the reviews on trip advisor and the place did not disappoint. The restaurant is located on the Ho Chi Minh square in what looks like an old hotel. What they have done to this place is really cool and the “hotel” looks really good on the outside with all the different lights and signs. The place is easy to find, you cannot miss it. The poke bowl is at the back of the “hotel” on the 1st or 2nd. There’s plenty of comfy seating inside. Now to the poke bowls, they were absolutely delicious! The spicy salmon and spicy tuna were amazing and you can literally pick as many toppings as you want, all of the toppings were delicious too. Do not miss out on this restaurant

Do you like poke bowl? Don’t hesitate to go to Poke Saigon! You can choose between different kind of fish, rice, noodles and a variation of greens and sauces. Everybody said it was the best poke they’ve had! We will be back for more!
Sehr empfehlenswert Restaurant. Nicht ganz leicht zu finden. Aber es lohnt sich. Super Geschmack. Auch wenn es nicht direkt vietnamesische Küche ist.
It was a hard time to find this place, but it was worth it! The employees were very sweet and the bowls were amazing. You can put your own bowl together with amazing ingredients.
たまたま入ったお店です。; 料理もおいしいし、スタッフも優しいし、とても楽しかったです。皆にもオススメです。
料理が美味しくて、サービスも良いです。; お店で色々なりょうりを食べた。; 良かったです。; わたしのススメです
Du skal HELT KLART besøge Poke Saigon. Råvarerne er lækre og friske. Personalet er det sødste personale. Personalet er meget hjælpsomme. Vi skal tilbage

We decided to visit this place because of the positive reviews. It is safe to say that our high expectations were met! At poke Saigon, you can fully customize your own poke bowl. There is a large variety of toppings available ranging from tropical fruits like mango and pineapple to the more traditional toppings such as edamame and seaweed. With a price of only 120k dong for a delicious tofu bowl, I was pleasantly surprised by the value for money. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend.

Great spot - a little hard to find but it’s in the middle of the complex with all the restaurants on Duomg Nguyen Hue - go up the stairs and it’s tucked away! Staff was super nice, cool vibe and really good Poke

Nicht so leicht zu finden, aber absolut der Suche wert. Von der Straße aus sehr unscheinbar im 2.OG über einer Garage, ist es ein kleines, aber hübsches Restaurant. Man kann die Poke mit vielen verschiedenen sehr frischen Zutaten zusammenstellen und auch der europäische Magen verträgt das Essen einwandfrei. Der Service ist sehr aufmerksam und freundlich. Die Poke sind unfassbar lecker. Absolut Empfehlenswert!
It’s such a great restaurant, the staffs are really lovely and I have to say that u guys should try to eat at here
Delicious food & lovely staff. You can customize your bowl as per your own taste and tuck in immediately
This place is a must. Fantastic food in a clean and cute atmosphere. People who are working there are very friendly and nice. We are planning to return!
This is a great restaurant for a delicious and casual lunch/dinner. the food is fresh and tastes delicious and the staff are extremely friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend.

I went here for lunch and both the food and the service were an absolute dream come true. The poke bowl was delicious and fairly priced. Trang, the waitress here, was extreamly nice and accommodating. She even gave me some tips on what to see during my stay in Ho Chi Minh City. She also speaks English very well and was so easy to communicate with. Would highly recommend checking this place out.
Third time we come here with my girlfriend and its always delicious ! The staff is always very friendly and helpful. We highly recommend this place !
Had Poke first time and was a great place... Friendly staff, clean and very healthy meal. Recommended!

Delicious poke bowl! We ordered mix spicy salmon/octopus poke. Great variety of vegetables, sauces and toppings to add.; The staff was very friendly and helpful.; We plan to come back!; Would strongly recommend!

Love everything about this place. The staffs are fast and friendly, they speak really good English. The decoration is lovely. And their food is worth-coming, fresh and delicious. I’ve been here twice and never got disappointed. Definitely will come back!!

After a week in Vietnam, the crew was ready for a break from the standard Pho, etc and found Poke Saigon.; ; While you might be a surprised to find such a bright, cheery and airy spot after walking up the stairs through the scooter parking garage, don't let that garage dissuade you from walking up to Poke Saigon!; ; SO many choices of combinations. SO fresh and tasty! Sure to have something for everyone.; ; Outstanding and super friendly service! Best meal in Saigon!
Found the restaurant on Google when I visited the cathedral and was very surprised about the quality, price and atmosphere of the restaurant. Very friendly people. Highly recommend it.
Me llamo la atención que estuviera en #4 de Saigón y comprobé porque, el lugar no es fácil de llegar y la entrada al edificio piensas que es la entrada de algún trabajo
Gode poke bowls hvor man selv kan sammensætte, hvad man vil have i. Stedet har et stort udvalg og råvarerne er friske.

Estando en Saigón buscamos los mejores restaurantes en opinión de los viajeros que publican de TripAdvisor. Con esa información llegamos a Poke en Saigón. Al llegar es difícil imaginar que te vas a encontrar con un pequeño restaurant, muy bien aseado y con un diseño minimalista y bonito. La comida estuvo exquisita, de todo gusto y cada cual de la familia eligió una combinación de bases y complementos. Realmente vale la pena. Intentamos ir al mismo en Hanoi pero estaba cerrado el domingo
Super lieve werknemers en super lekker. Je kan zoveel toppings nemen als je wil. Ben hier de volgende dag weer heen gegaan, zo lekker en leuk!

Fantastisk poke bowl, den godaste jag ätit!Underbar personal som pratar engelska.; Lite svårt att hitta dit men så värt det! Det ligger på tredje våningen, du får ta dig via en ruffig trappuppgång för att komma dit!
Fantastyczne miejsce! Wspaniała obsługa, duży wybór dodatków, świerze składniki, zaskakująco niska cena i super lojalizacja, polecam!

Pour avoir essayé plusieurs poké entre Hawaï et le Canada, ceux du Poké Saïgon, pour la variété d’ingrédients,la générosité et le rapport qualité/prix sont les meilleurs que j’ai mangé! C’était très frais et goûteux ! C’est environ 9.15$(CAN) pour un bol, normalement vendu le double dans un restaurant à Montréal donc c’est un bon prix!; Le restaurant se trouve dans un bloc appartement transformé en espace de restauration où ce trouve plusieurs autres cafés/boutiques/restaurants! Très belle trouvaille :)

Esta en la segunda planta, al principio nos dió miedo subir por allí, ya que un lugar limpio en Vietnam es difícil de encontrar, y no sabiamos donde nos metíamos. Pero el lugar resulta super limpio y agradable. Un poke riquisimo en un lugar acojedor y personal super amable!!!
직원은 웃는 얼굴로 친절함; 음식은 내가 원하는 것을 골라 선택. 밥과 샐러드를 반반하는것이 좋아보임; 연어와 오징어는 나름 싱싱하고 좋음.; 중요한것은 소스의 선택. 겨자는 나름 우수.
Super lekkere sushi bowl gegeten en de meiden die het maken zijn erg lief en spreken heel goed Engels!
Man väljer själv sina favoriter till en fantastiskt god poke bowl. Tips på ett par blandningar finns. Trevlig personal!; Skulle vilja ha hemma i Sverige!
Fräsch poké! Gott! Lite svårt hitta hit. Upp för trappa i nåt köpcentra. Schysst personal som kunde bra engelska. Bra lunchställe!

Vi scrivo mentre sto finendo di mangiare al poke Saigon first floor....; Il locale e piccolino ma perfetto... Musica romantica di sottofondo ed aria condizionata settata in maniera perfetta.; Le ragazze alla cassa di una gentilezza quasi imbarazzante.... Ti aiutano spegandoti tutto nel dettaglio e ti suggeriscono una marea di idea per preparare il tuo poke perfetto.; Tantissimi ingredienti a disposizione fanno si che la tua scodella esca super buona super ricca e strabordante di ingredienti....; Assolutamente da non mancare...; Localino perfetto.; Bravi bravi bravi.
깔끔하고 직원도 친절하고 무엇보다 너무 맛있었어요; 밥과 샐러드는 반반해서 드세요 정말 맛남!; 존맛탱 ㅋㅋㅋjmt; 저는 다시 가라면 또 가서 먹고 싶어요

Uns hat es total gut geschmeckt! Man kann so viele Toppings haben wie man will und das ist echt großzügig! Außerdem kann man sich entscheiden zwischen Sushireis, Braunem Reis oder halb Reis halb Salat. Dazu kann man jeweils zwei Sorten Fisch wählen.; Hat super Lecker und ganz frisch geschmeckt, können wir wirklich empfehlen. Eine reguläre Poke wie oben beschrieben hat 160.000 vnd gekostet
wir waren heute an unserem ersten Abend in der Stadt hier und waren absolut zufrieden. Total leckeres Essen und die zwei Damen waren super nett! sollte man sich nicht entgehen lassen!

I was very please with my experience in this small poké shop. The food tasted fresh and Lendy, the shop attendant was helpful and friendly. It was my first time in the shop and she introduced me to all of the available base and topping options with the utmost patience, and offered up intriguing suggestions on pairing the poke bowls with a refreshing drink. Upon entering a poké shop, one isn’t expecting much of the experience, however, this one visit to Poké Saigon was surely a pleasurable one and has left a warm impression on me. I highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a chill place to eat a delicious poke bowl in a peaceful and clean environment.
We have had Poke in numerous places around the world, including Hawaii and this was the best we have ever had. Excellent service!

This restaurant is a little hard to find as there is no sign. Walking through allies and narrow hallways is part of the journey. Really delicious and inexpensive bowls of healthy food. Service was excellent too!

We went to this restaurant with my dad today - 6.2.2020 and it was great. Firstly we were surprised, you need to go to the first floor through some motorbike rental or what was it. But the restaurant is very nice, good service and the food looked and tasted great. So happy to find something like this.

Tracked this special one room restaurant down on the second floor and what a delight. Modernistic yet simple setting, and tremendous range of fresh vegetables, salads and healthy seafood at very modest prices. This is a poke kitchen offering both quality produce served in a great environment and with a distinctly modern approach. Highly recommend this one when visiting Saigon..
the first time here and of course not the last one. The bowl was fresh and so tasty. Friendly staffs and great service
Amazing poke bowl! Arrived to Ho Chi Minh and looked for a place to eat, so glad I tried this one! The staff is so nice, there is a variety of toppings to choose from; I really recommend this place!
The best Poke bowl I’ve ever tried. Good portions and a massive selection of options to choose from. Great customer service from the staff too. Must try when in Ho Chi Minh.
Simply amazing! Lovely atmosphere, delicious ingredients and friendly staff who speak very good English. We really enjoyed our meal, which was prepared exactly to our individual wishes.
Had a lovely poke bowl and staff was very nice and kind. Ingredients are super fresh and it was a nice change after eating Vietnamese food for 3 weeks.

After you will find the place at the first floor of the building, you will discover this nice and modern place. The staff are so nice, helpful and friendly. The food is delicious and fresh, I hardly recommend this restaurant to have a break during a hot afternoon ! (+the music is good !)

If you wanna eat clean, I highly recommend this place. Best choice ever. Everything was delicious , I felt as if they just took all the vegetables from the garden. Moreover, you can customize a bowl of your liking. The price was suitable.; Lovely !

Was looking for something fresh and different and this really delivered! The portions were really generous, I was so full and satisfied! The staff were amazing and so kind, giving us lots of recommendations. Really, really tasty!

We stumbled across this amazing little restaurant and were served by attentive and welcoming staff - especially Lindy who explained how you create your bowl and made great suggestions for complimentary flavours.; ; One of the best meals I've has in Vietnam, all fresh food and leaving you feeling very satisfied.; ; A must visit if you are in the cafe apartments!

Delicious healthy food in Saigon with a great and profesional costumer service with affordable price.; You can create your own poke bowl salad as per your taste between a bunch of available healthy ingredients with also delivery service everywhere in a city.

Awesome Poke! Finding the place took a little time, but it’s inside one of the plazas and then just take the stairs up. The Spicy Salmon was great, and I enjoyed their wasabi mayo. Great friendly service too
Go here! The food here is well worth a visit. The staff are really friendly and you get a big amout of food for the price you pay.

Som andre også har skrevet, er det lidt svært at finde restauranten. Men der er blevet lagt nogle gode billeder op i anmeldelsene hvordan man finder stedet - vi fulgte det og kom herhen. Det ligger på 2. Etage i en snusket bygning, men restauranten er virkelig fin!; Her er virkelig god atmosfære og sødt personale, som glædeligt forklarer konceptet. Personalet er gode til engelsk og vil gerne smalltalke! vil helt klart anbefale alle at spise her hvis man er i ho Chi Minh!!
Good vegetarian options, staff are very friendly and helpful :)); Little bit hard to find, but worth it !

Good pokebowl, many toppings to choose from and you can choose as many as you like. Bonus: they will top up your salad and/or sauce for free! The two girls who were working during my visit were extremely nice.

Just what we needed for lunch ...fresh and delicious. Head up some stairs opposite Starbucks on Time Square. It's a little hard to find the entrance to the complex...lookslike you are going into a warehouse or something(!). Walk up stairs to 2ns floor and you will find the simply wonderful Poke Saigon. The staff are super friendly and explain it all. You choose a base of either rice or salad (Or half and half), tow proteins and as many toppings and sauces as you like. The food was fresh and tasty and a lovely change from Vietnamese food. My daughter and I loved it! 160,000 dang per bowl....good value for what you get.
Outstanding poke bowl! Full of fresh flavours, vibrant colours and really tasty sauce. Charming, really helpful, smiley girls. Super tasty, best poke bowl I've had!
Fantastisk food!!; The food was fresh and the service was good! You get alot of food for the money!!!!

Está en un edificio con pequeños restaurantes repartidos por todas las plantas. Cuando llegas al "local" de Poke Saigon es muy bonito y acodegor, no os quedéis con la imagen de la entrada al bloque. Te lo preparan para llevártelo y la comida nos encantó!!! Una magnífica idea, un acierto seguro chic@s.
Très bonne adresse pour manger sainement et généreusement. Bel endroit et personnel très accueillant.

Served by the very helpful Nghi. Having eaten Vietnamese food for 3 weeks, we came across this treasure- opposite Starbucks in Times Square ( you will need to go up a few flights of stairs, but well worthwhile) this glorious fresh food is so flavoursome. I had spicy tuna & octopus with sushi rice, lettuce, seaweed, fried dried shallots, edamame beans, pickled red cabbage & broccoli. In a group of 4 picky eaters , we all had a different selection for our Poke bowl. 4 empty bowls was evidence of our satisfaction. Go seek it out.
It's just delicious. You can choose salats, rice, fishs, sauces, topings and more. Very friendly and helpful staff.

My first time eating a poke and I was stunned how I had not heard about the dish before. It was delicious. The staff were really helpful and gave me suggestions what to order since I hadn't build a poke before. The place itself is nice, clean and trendy. To find the place go through the alleyway and take two set of stairs up.

Lekkere pokébowl, wij zijn in Hanoi echt 4x geweest, maar deze in Saigon kon daar helaas niet helemaal aan tippen. Personeel minder vriendelijk, meerdere dingen waren op en ze doen minder veel van de toppings erop. Verder wel een goede pokébowl!
My favorite: brown rice, spice tuna, spicy mayo, wakame, radish, shrimps, fried garlic. They are not fast but always good!

If you are looking for fresh, delicious food served by friendly staff, this is the place to go. Reasonably priced, the poke bowls are delicious and fresh and full of flavour and the staff were friendly! It was a nice little spot to catch a few minutes of quiet from the hustle and bustle of the streets of Ho Chi Minh!; ; Tip: When you get to the address, you need to walk through what looks like a bike shop but is actually the entry to the stairs. If you are looking at the little coffee shop on street level, the bike storage is to the left. Go in there and up the stairs and you will see a little row of shops and poke is in the end with its own little oasis.

We looked up best lunch spots in Saigon and as this was top of the list we headed in. Was a bit unsure walking through a motorbike shop and up some dark stairs where exactly we were headed but the food (and drink) here is amazing, fresh and clean. Staff were friendly and helpful - be prepared for a little wait if you arrive right on lunchtime but it’s well worth it
Amazing food and service!; You can build your own bowl or pick from one of the options.; ; Must stop here if you’re in Ho Chi Minh
A quite location to enjoy cleaning eating. Everything is fresh and beautiful and so tasty! Thanks for a delicious meal!!
Hard to find, but hard to leave! This restaurant serves a delicious bowls at a reasonable price. It's such kind of healthy food we've ever had.
2 poke pour le déjeuner, service rapide, poke super bon, personnel gentil et souriant, restaurant joli et propre. Au top !Super rapport qualité/prix !

Raikasta ja maukasta ruokaa, kohtuu hinnat. Ihana lounaspaikka, hyvä ilmastointi ja siisti. Ystävällinen palvelu, hyvä englanti.; Ainoa huono oli paikan sijainti, vaikea löytää. Toisessa kerroksessa ja kulku läpi skootteritallin.
Amazing food, friendly staff. They help you well with your order and the food tastes good. Location looks nice as well.
At first is the entrance was a bit hard to find, however the service and food is amazing! Really want try it again sometime.

If you happen to to be around the walking street in Saigon, this place is very recommended to satisfy your hungry stomach. I came to Poke Saigon 1 year ago for the first time, that was the first time I tried Poke and I was amazed! It was so delicious and the best thing is that you can arrange your own Poke bowl up to your preference. For me, I like the spicy tuna and spicy salmon here.
